T06pskvbhu:2: namo buddhāya || pañca skandhā ityādi prakaraṇārambhaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:4: nanu ca yogācārabhūmyādiṣu śāstreṣu dharmalakṣaṇaṃ nirdhāritam eveti punas tannirdhāraṇāya yatnavaiyarthyam /
T06pskvbhu:6: udghaṭitajñā hi diṅmātreṇa tatsambhavino viśeṣān niravaśeṣān avaboddhuṃ samarthā iti saṅkṣepoktim eva bahu manyante ,
T06pskvbhu:8: ataś ca saṅkṣiptarucisattvānugrahāyedaṃ prakaraṇam ārabdham iti /
T06pskvbhu:10: manasikārābhiyuktānāṃ ca pravrajitānām api vistaragranthābhiyogo vikṣepāyaivety ubhayeṣām api dharmalakṣaṇavyutpattyartham iha prakaraṇe dharmalakṣaṇaṃ samāsenoktam iti nāsti tadārambhavaiyarthyam /
T06pskvbhu:11: athavā saṅkṣepeṇa dharmalakṣaṇavyutpannā ayatnena dharmalakṣaṇavistarapratipattisamarthā bhaviṣyantīty ato yogācārabhūmyādīnāṃ vistaragranthānāṃ praveśabhūtam idam ācāryeṇa prakaraṇaṃ kṛtam iti /
T06pskvbhu:12: kiṃ punar dharmalakṣaṇavyutpattyā vinā na sidhyati yatrācāryo dharmalakṣaṇanirdeśaṃ praty ādriyate /
T06pskvbhu:14: tathā hi dharmalakṣaṇakṛtaparicayasya sandehābhāvād yatheṣṭam ālambane cittam ekāgrībhavati nānyathā /
T06pskvbhu:16: viśāradaś ca sāṅkathyaviniścayeṣu sarvapraśnatadvyākaraṇanirdeśasamartho bhavati nānyathā //
T06pskvbhu:19: pañcaiva skandhā na nyūnā adhikā vā /
T06pskvbhu:23: tathā hi bāhyādhyātmikasya rūpasya karaṇatvena karmatvena vātmanā sambandha iti rūpaskandha ātmīyagrāhaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:25: tāṃ cātmā saṃvedayata iti vedanāskandha ātmīyagrāhaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:32: dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣv artheṣv ātmanaḥ sañjñādvāreṇa saṃvyavahāraḥ pravartata iti sañjñāskandha ātmīyagrāhaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:33: kuśalākuśalādiṣu saṃskārair ātmābhimatasya cittasya preraṇātsaṃskāraskandha ātmīyagrāha iti [p. 3] pañcaiva skandhaḥ //
T06pskvbhu:36: tatra sarvaudārikaṃ rūpaṃ sapratighatvāt pañcavijñānakāyāśrayatvāt ṣaḍvijñānaviṣayatvāt /
T06pskvbhu:39: tathā hy adeśasthām api sañjñādivat pracāraudārikatvād deśaparicchedena tām eva vyapadiśanti na sañjñādīn - haste me vedanā śirasi me vedaneti
T06pskvbhu:54: sambandhārthā ceyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī rūpaskandhayor iti rūpād anya eva [p. 4] skandhaḥ prāpnoti /
T06pskvbhu:58: abhede 'pi ṣaṣṭhī dṛṣṭā tattvānyatvenāvācye ca -- pratimāyāḥ śarīram ,
T06pskvbhu:63: anyavastugrahaṇāpekṣaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād yatra grahaṇam abhidhānaṃ ca tad upādānavyatiriktasvabhāvābhāvāt prajñaptisat /
T06pskvbhu:64: tathaiva ca skandhārtha iti prajñaptisann ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:65: ataś ca tattvānyatvenāvācyatve 'pi svopādānāt ṣaṣṭhī na virudhyate /
T06pskvbhu:68: catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtāny upādāya /
T06pskvbhu:69: nanu ca skandhānāṃ prakṛtatvāt katamad rūpam ity asambaddhaḥ praśnaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:75: rūpasya kāryakāraṇabhāvena bhedapradarśanārtham āha -- catvāri mahābhūtānītyādi /
T06pskvbhu:76: tathā hi sarvāṇi mahābhūtāni sarvasyopādāyarūpasya kāraṇam ,
T06pskvbhu:80: bhūtatvaṃ tu punar eṣāṃ vividhopādāyarūpanirvṛttau tais taiḥ prakārair bhavantīti bhūtāni /
T06pskvbhu:81: sarvasattvakarmādhipatyād vānādau saṃsāre na kadācin nābhūvann iti bhūtāni /
T06pskvbhu:83: tāni punaś catvāry eva na nyūnādhikāni ,
T06pskvbhu:86: tasya caitāvadbhir eva parisamāptatvād anyasya ca karaṇīyasyābhāvāt ,
T06pskvbhu:88: nanu ca dhṛtyādivad avakāśam apy upādāyarūpasya kāryam /
T06pskvbhu:89: tac cākāśena kriyata iti pṛthivyādivad ākāśasyāpi mahābhūtatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:92: na hy ākāśaṃ nāma kiñcid asty anyatra sapratigharūpābhāvamātrāt /
T06pskvbhu:93: avakāśaṃ ca sapratigham eva vastu svasminn avakāśe sapratighasyaiva tasmād apasaraṃ dadāti ,
T06pskvbhu:95: na hi tasmāt pradeśād rūpavad ākāśam apasṛtam iti tasyāvakāśadānaṃ na yujyate /
T06pskvbhu:98: tasmād yatra yasya yasmin saty avakāśābhāvaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:99: yasminn asati tasya tatrāvakāśa iti tenaiva tasmāt sthānād apasaratā tasyāvakāśo dattaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:102: [p. 6] catvāri ca mahābhūtāny upādāyeti catvāri ca mahābhūtāni rūpaṃ catvāri ca mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpam iti ,
T06pskvbhu:104: pañcaprakāreṇa janananiśrayapratiṣṭhopastambhabṛṃhaṇānāṃ hetubhāvena bhautikaṃ bhūtāny upādatta ity upādāyaśabdo hetvarthaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:105: tadyathendhanam upādāyāgnir bhavatīti tena nimitteneti gamyate /
T06pskvbhu:111: pṛthivīdhātur ityādivyākaraṇaṃ -- svalakṣaṇopādāyarūpadhāraṇāt pṛthivyādaya eva dhātavaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:115: tatra laukikā varṇasaṃsthānātmakatvāt sāṃvyavahārikā iti na dhātavaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:117: bhūtavat pṛthivīdhātvādayo 'pi svarūpanirdeśam a[p. 7]ntareṇa na vijñāyanta iti punar api praśnaḥ -- pṛthivīdhātuḥ katama ityādi /
T06pskvbhu:119: khakkhaṭam eva khakkhaṭatvam na hy atra bhāvāntaram asti /
T06pskvbhu:121: sneho 'bdhātur iti saṃśrayātmakatvād dravatvād vā snehaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:124: laghutvaṃ vāyudhātur ity ucyamāna upādāyarūpasyāpi bhūtatvaṃ prasajyeta /
T06pskvbhu:125: īraṇaṃ vāyudhātur ity ucyamāne karmaivāsya nirdiṣṭaṃ syān na svarūpam ity ato 'sya laghutvād upādāyarūpāt karmaṇaś cavyavacchedārtham evam uktaṃ laghusamudīraṇatvaṃ vāyudhātur iti /
T06pskvbhu:127: ete ca pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātava upādāyarūpeṇeva parasparato 'py avinirbhāgavartina iti kathaṃ vijñāyate /
T06pskvbhu:129: ata eva caiṣāṃ dhṛtisaṅgrahapaktivyūhanāni kāritram uktam /
T06pskvbhu:132: tathā hy [p. 8] upalādiṣu saṅgrahapaktivyūhanebhyo jalānalānilānāṃ pṛthivīdhātunā sāhacaryaṃ vijñāyate /
T06pskvbhu:135: vāyau sandhāraṇavastrādiśoṣaṇāvisārebhyaḥ kṣityudakānalānāṃ vāyudhātunā sāhacaryaṃ vijñāyate /
T06pskvbhu:140: pākāpekṣayā tejasaḥ paktiḥ karmavardhanīyakalalāṅkurāpekṣayā vyūhanaṃ vāyoḥ karma /
T06pskvbhu:142: svabhāvas tu sarvānyabhāvanirapekṣa ity ayaṃ karmaṇaḥ svabhāvasya ca viśeṣaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:144: bhūtānantaroddiṣṭam upādāyarūpaṃ prabhedataḥ svarūpataś ca na vijñāyata ity ataḥ pṛcchati -- upādāyarūpaṃ katamad iti /
T06pskvbhu:150: varṇālocanād varṇanirbhāsāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvād vā varṇo viṣayo 'syeti varṇaviṣayaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:152: tadyathā prasanna ādarśa udakapātre vā bimbaṃ pratītya tatpratibhāsaṃ pratibimbam utpadyate ,
T06pskvbhu:153: tadvat pañcasu rūpaprasādātmakeṣu cakṣurādiṣu rūpagandhādīn pratītya tatpratibhāsā vijñaptaya utpadyante /
T06pskvbhu:154: atra cakṣurādīnāṃ parasparato viṣayarūpātmakāt prasādān manastaḥ śraddhātaś ca vyavacchedaḥ kāryaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:155: rūpaprasādātmakatvāviśeṣād varṇaviṣayatvāviśeṣāc ca ubhayam ucyate varṇaviṣayo rūpaprasāda iti ca /
T06pskvbhu:156: tatra varṇaviṣayatvena śrotrādibhyo viṣayaprasādāc ca vyavacchinatti /
T06pskvbhu:157: na hi śrotrādayo viṣayaprasādo vā varṇaviṣayo 'sti /
T06pskvbhu:159: tad dhi saty api varṇaviṣayatve na rūpaprasādātmakam /
T06pskvbhu:161: śraddhāpi hi prasādātmikā rūpādiviṣayā cety ato rūpagrahaṇam /
T06pskvbhu:162: varṇaviṣayaḥ prasādaś cakṣurindriyam ity ucyamāne śraddhāyā api prasaṅga ity ato rūpagrahaṇaṃ kriyata iti śraddhāyā arū[p. 10]pātmakatvāt /
T06pskvbhu:164: īśanta ity arthaḥ ādhipatyam asmin saṅghātekurvantīty arthaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:172: tadyathā vijānātīti vijñānam iti prāpte lyuḍartham anādṛtya vijñānam uktaṃ tadvyatiriktavijñātṛsaṅgrahavyudāsārtham evam ihāpīndriyavyatiriktaliṅgakalpanāvyudāsārtham evam uktaṃ syād iti /
T06pskvbhu:173: yathaiva hi cakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayiṇāṃ parasparato viṣayabhedena bheda uktaḥ -- cakṣurindriyaṃ katamat /
T06pskvbhu:177: evaṃ rūpādīnām api viṣayāṇāṃ cakṣurādibhir viṣayibhir bheda ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:181: atra ca manaso navidhir na pratiṣedho 'prakṛtatvāt /
T06pskvbhu:182: evaṃ ca rūpādīnāṃ parasparato bheda ukto bhavati -- cakṣuṣo viṣayo rūpam eva ,
T06pskvbhu:184: evam api nīlapītādīnāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇānāṃcakṣurindriyaviṣayāṇāṃ rūpatvenābheda ukto bhavatīti /
T06pskvbhu:186: evaṃ sati varṇasaṃsthā[p. 11]naṃ vijñaptiś ceti kimartham /
T06pskvbhu:188: rūpaprabhedeṣu hi sandigdhaviparyastāvyutpannānāṃ bhedapradarśanena sandehaviparyāsāvyutpattayo nirākriyante /
T06pskvbhu:191: abhraṃ dhūmorajo mahikā cchāyātapa āloko 'ndhakāramabhyavakāśaṃnabhaśceti te 'pi kasmād atra noktāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:194: tatra ye paricchinnadeśās te saṃsthāna evāntarbhūtāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:196: na varṇasaṃsthānābhyāṃ pṛthag vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyanta itīhapṛthag noktāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:198: na bho yad upariṣṭān nīlam upalabhyate /
T06pskvbhu:199: saṃsthānaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalam unnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātam iti /
T06pskvbhu:204: evaṃ tarhi na varṇādivyatiriktaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vidyate /
T06pskvbhu:206: [p. 12] yasmād ekadiṅmukhapravṛtte bhūyasi varṇādisaṅghāte dīrghabuddhir bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:212: kathaṃ punar etad gamyate -- varṇādisamudāye dīrghabuddhir bhavati na punar arthāntarabhūte saṃsthāna iti /
T06pskvbhu:219: yathā gandhaḥ puṣpavarṇaniyataḥ na tv evaṃ sparśaḥ saṃsthāna iti viṣamo 'yam upanyāsaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:220: tasmād ubhayendriyadvāreṇa ghaṭādivad dīrghādisaṃsthānapravṛtteḥ na tad varṇādibhyo'rthāntaram iti /
T06pskvbhu:221: na ca niravayavatvāt paramāṇūnāṃ dīrghādirūpeṇa [p. 13] parasparato bhedo yuktaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:222: tasmān na nīlādiparamāṇuvad dīrghādiparamāṇavaḥ santīty ataś ca saṃsthānaparamāṇusamudāyo 'pi dīrghādisaṃsthānam ity ayuktam ,
T06pskvbhu:228: sambandhibhedāc catasyāvaśyaṃ bhedena bhavitavyam abhede vātatsambandhīnām apy abhinnatvaprasaṅga iti /
T06pskvbhu:230: kiṃ tarhi varṇādiṣv eva tathā tathāvyavasthiteṣu dīrghādi prajñapyate //
T06pskvbhu:231: atha vijñaptir nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:232: tadālambanacittajaṃ kāyamahābhūtāśrayeṇotpannaṃ kāyasya saṃsthānaṃ svasamutthāpakacittavijñapanād vijñaptir ity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:233: atra ca tadālambanād eva yaj jāyate cittāt saṃsthānam tad eva vijñaptiḥ na punar anyālambanāt /
T06pskvbhu:234: evaṃ ca punar bruvata oṣṭhādisaṃsthānam atadālambanacittajatvān nirākṛtam ,
T06pskvbhu:236: tad dhi praṇidhānacittād anyavipākahetucittajam [p. 14] apīti na vijñaptir iṣyate /
T06pskvbhu:237: tatra yadi vijñaptyākhyaṃ saṃsthānam ekaṃ kāyākhyasamudāyavyāpi tad ekatvād vyāpitvāc ca pratyavayavaṃ gṛhyate sarvasmiṃs tadbhāvāt /
T06pskvbhu:248: sā ca kāyasya deśāntarotpattiḥ svanimittaṃ cetanāṃ vijñāpayatīti vijñaptiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:252: atra tu rūpavyavasthānaṃ svabhāvataḥ sanniveśataḥ kriyālakṣaṇataś ca /
T06pskvbhu:259: saṃsthānasya vijñapteś caprajñaptisattvā[p. 15]t na cakṣuṣo viṣayatvam asti /
T06pskvbhu:261: atra hi lokānuvṛttyā varṇaḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaṇaś cakṣurviṣayatvena vivakṣitaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:262: tathā hi saṃsthānaviśiṣṭaś cakṣuṣā varṇo gṛhyate ,
T06pskvbhu:265: ato varṇaḥ saṃsthānaṃ ca cakṣuṣo viṣaya iti loke prasiddhiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:266: tathā deśāntarotpattiviśiṣṭakāyasantatigrahaṇād vijñaptir api cakṣuṣo viṣaya iti prasiddhiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:267: paramārthatas tu saṃsthānavan na varṇo 'pi cakṣuṣo viṣayaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:270: rūpānantaram uddiṣṭatvāt tannirdeśānantaram eva śabdasya nirdeśo nyāyya iti praśnaḥ -- śabdaḥ katamaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:274: śrotraviṣayaś ca śabda eveti parasparabhinnānāṃ śabdabhedānāṃ śabdāyatanatvenābheda ukto bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:286: sa ca gandhaḥ sahajaḥ sāṃyogikaḥ pāriṇāmikaś ca /
T06pskvbhu:292: jihvāviṣayaś ca rasa eveti pūrvad vistareṇa vaktavyam /
T06pskvbhu:294: a[p. 17]nyas tu bhedastatsaṃyogabhedāt anantaś ca bhavati //
T06pskvbhu:296: rasānantaraṃ tu spraṣṭavyaikadeśa upādāyarūpatvenoddiṣṭa ity ato rasanirdeśānantaraṃ spraṣṭavyaikadeśanirdidikṣayā praśnaḥ -- spraṣṭavyaikadeśaḥ katama iti /
T06pskvbhu:299: bhūtāni ca pūrvam uddiṣṭāni nirdiṣṭāni ca /
T06pskvbhu:301: ataḥ spraṣṭavyaikadeśaḥ katama upādāyarūpam iti sambadhyate /
T06pskvbhu:302: kāyasya viṣaya iti kāyasyaiva viṣayo na cakṣurādīnām iti rūpaśabdādibhyo 'sya bheda ukto bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:303: kāyasya ca viṣayaḥ sparśa eveti bhūtabhautikayoḥ parasparavilakṣaṇatve 'pi sparśatvenābheda ukto bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:304: kāyasya viṣaya iti bhūtānām api kāyaviṣayatvād upādāyarūpaprasaṅga ity ata āha -- mahābhūtāni sthāpayitveti /
T06pskvbhu:306: nanu ca kāyendriyeṇa spṛśyata iti ślakṣṇatvādi spraṣṭavyam ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:307: yac ca yena spṛśyate niyogāt tad api tat spṛśatīti kāyendriye 'pi sparśatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:309: sarvātmanā sparśane hi sarvapiṇḍāḥ paramāṇupramāṇāḥ syuḥ /
T06pskvbhu:310: pradeśena sparśane paramāṇūnāṃ sāvayavatvaprasaṅgāt paramāṇutvam avahīyate /
T06pskvbhu:311: tasmād viṣayendriyayor nirantarotpattau yadāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ [p. 18] viṣayamupalabhate tena sa viṣayaḥ spṛṣṭa ity upacaryate na tu viṣayeṇa vijñānāśrayaḥ
T06pskvbhu:312: ata eva kāyendriyeṇa bhūtāny eva spṛśyanta ity upacaryate ,
T06pskvbhu:321: ślakṣṇatvaṃ mṛdv aparūṣam āliṅganakṣamam ity arthaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:336: nanu ca grīṣme śaradi ca saty api śīta uṣṇābhilāṣo na bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:339: evaṃ ca tatkāryam api tajjātīyatvāl lakṣyate [p. 19] lākṣaṇikaiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:343: ataḥ kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtveha nirdeśo jighatsā pipāseti /
T06pskvbhu:344: vāyudhātubhūyiṣṭho hi kaścit spraṣṭavyaviśeṣo jighatsāhetuḥ koṣṭha utpadyate /
T06pskvbhu:361: evam anyasminn apy upādāyarūpe ya[p. 20]thāsambhavam āśrayaviśeṣāt parasparaviśeṣo 'vagantavya iti /
T06pskvbhu:362: atra tu diṅmātraṃ pradarśitaṃ granthagauravaparihārārtham iti //
T06pskvbhu:363: rūpaskandhād upādāyarūpād vāvijñaptir evāvaśiṣyata iti praśnaḥ -- avijñaptiḥ katameti /
T06pskvbhu:364: tannirdeśaḥ -- vijñaptisamādhijaṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ rūpam anidarśanam apratigham iti /
T06pskvbhu:369: avijñaptir api trividhaiva kāmāptā rūpāptānāsravā ca /
T06pskvbhu:371: sā punaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaro bodhisattvasaṃvaro 'saṃvaras tadviyuktā ca /
T06pskvbhu:374: tatra prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ sanidānāt sarvākārāt paropaghātān nivṛttiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:380: tatra caturṣu dhyāneṣv anāgamye dhyānāntare ca sāsravasamādhijo dhyānasaṃvaraḥ /
T06pskvbhu:382: tasyās tūpādāyarūpatvaṃ bhūtāny āśritya pravṛtter anuvṛtteś ca /
T06pskvbhu:383: idam ihāmutrety ayam eva vyapadeśo nidarśanam /
T06pskvbhu:386: sa cāvijñapter adeśatvān na sambhavatīty apratigham /
T06pskvbhu:389: anidarśanaṃ sapratigham -- cakṣurādayaḥ pañca śabdagandharasasparśāś catvāraḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:391: tat punaḥ pañcaprakāram -- ābhisaṅkṣepikam ābhyavakāśikaṃ sāmādānikaṃ parikalpitaṃ vaibhūtvikaṃ ceti /
T06pskvbhu:392: iha tv ekādaśadravya eva rūpaskandho vivakṣita iti sāmādānikam eva rūpam anidarśanam apratigham ity uktam ,
T06pskvbhu:395: ābhisaṅkṣepikaṃ paramāṇava eva nīlādikād varṇān na bhidyante /
T06pskvbhu:396: na ca [p. 22] varṇanibhā anyā nīlādikād varṇāt /
T06pskvbhu:398: te ca varṇātmakatvādihopāttā eveti punar na nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:402: na hi tat tadākāravijñānapratyavabhāsād bahir vidyate /
T06pskvbhu:403: pratibimbaṃ ca viṣayapratyavabhāso vijñānasyaiveti na vijñānāt pratibimbaṃ pratibimbād vā vijñānaṃ pṛthag asti /
T06pskvbhu:406: ko vā prabhāvamahatām asmadvidho buddhivispanditāny avagāhituṃ samarthaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:408: etad uktaṃ bhavati vijñaptisamādhisambhūtaṃ kuśalākuśalam upādāyarūpam vikṣiptāvikṣiptacittasyācittasya ca yad anubadhnāti ,
T06pskvbhu:409: tat parityāgakāraṇābhāve uktaṃ bhavati -- avijñaptir iti /
T06pskvbhu:410: rūpakriyāsvabhāvāpi satī svasamutthāpakaṃ cittaṃ vijñaptivat paraṃ na vijñapayatīty avijñaptiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:411: atra ca vaibhāṣikaparikalpitavijñaptivad avijñaptir api naivāsti ,
T06pskvbhu:414: tathā hi yayā cetanayākṛtābhyupagama upasampadādividhānapūrvakaṃ pratiṣiddhāt karmaṇaḥ kāyavācau saṃvṛṇoti ,
T06pskvbhu:416: yata uttarakālam ahaṃ prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativirata iti samādānasmṛtir utpadyate /
T06pskvbhu:417: tasyāṃ samutpannāyāṃ yo lajjī na sa śikṣāṃ bhinatti /
T06pskvbhu:418: evaṃ ca sānubandhā samādānacetanā saṃvara ity uktaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:419: tathā dhyānaṃ mārgaṃ vā samāpanno vināpy avijñaptyā tadrūpaṃ mārgam āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate ,
T06pskvbhu:420: yasya pratilambhād vyutthito 'pi na punar mithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate ,
T06pskvbhu:428: evaṃ ca kriyācetanābhyupagamacetanā ca sattveṣu drohāśayānugatāsaṃvara ity uktaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:429: atra ca vijñaptisamādhijatvaṃ subodham eveti na punar iha prapañcitam /
T06pskvbhu:432: dhyānānāsravasaṃvarayor api dhyānānāsravamārganimittatvāt saṃyagvāgādiphalatvāc ca kuśalatvam /
T06pskvbhu:436: kasmāt punar ayam avijñaptiparyanto rūpaskandho rūpam ity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:437: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā -- rūpyate rūpyata iti bhikṣavas tasmād rūpopādānaskandhaity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:440: sūtre hi -- pāṇyādisaṃsparśena rūpaṇād rūpam ity uktam /
T06pskvbhu:446: rūpaskandhānantaraṃ vedanāskandhanirdeśāvasaras tadanantaram uddiṣṭatvād iti praśnaḥ -- vedanā katameti /
T06pskvbhu:449: atha vā hlādaparitāpobhayākāravinirmuktaṃ vastusvarūpam anubhavatīty anubhavaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:455: punaś coktam -- sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇād aduḥkhāsukhasya ceti /
T06pskvbhu:459: tathā coktam -- sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhā vedanetivistaraḥ /
T06pskvbhu:464: evaṃ tarhi sañjñādhimokṣasmṛtiprajñādīnām ālambanadvārako vedanāvat svabhāvo na vaktavyaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:465: athaikālambanebhyo nimittodgrahaṇādibhiḥ sañjñādīnāṃ viśeṣa ucyate vedanāyā viṣayānubhavena kiṃ neṣyate /
T06pskvbhu:466: sparśānubhavaś ca tatsamprayogaḥ kāraṇabhāvo vā parikalpyeta ,
T06pskvbhu:472: na ca loke śāstre vānubhavaśabdaḥ kārye kāraṇe vā prasiddhaḥ /[p. 26] prasiddhas tu sākṣātkāre /
T06pskvbhu:473: evaṃ tu manyante -- śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhavanty anenety anubhavaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:481: yat tarhy uktaṃ pratītyasamutpāde -- yasyām utpannāyām aviyogecchā jāyate sā sukhā vedaneti ,
T06pskvbhu:485: yasyām utpannāyām aviyogecchā jāyata ity arthata uktaṃ bhavati -- tasyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ punaḥ saṃyogecchāpi bhavatīti /
T06pskvbhu:486: yasya nirodhe saṃyogacchando bhavatīty atrāpy arthata [p. 27]uktam bhavati -- tasyotpāde 'viyogacchando bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:487: yat tarhy anicchopagatarāgaparyavasthānānāṃ yatīnāṃ rāgaje sukha utpanne viyogecchā jāyate nirodhe cāsaṃyogacchandaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:491: śīlasamādhiparipanthitvaṃ tasya sukhasya paśyatāṃ tadubhayaṃ bhavatīti nāsti virodhaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:492: duḥkho yasyotpāde viyogacchanda iti nirodhe ca punar asaṃyogacchandaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:496: tatra kāyacittopacayapravṛttatvān manojñasvabhāvatvāc ca sukho 'nubhava iti nirodhe punas tatsaṃyogābhilāṣaḥ pravartate /
T06pskvbhu:497: kāyacittāpacayapravṛttatvāsvabhāvataś ca pratikūlo duḥkho'nubhava iti tasyotpādetadviyogacchando bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:502: [p. 28] eṣa tu trividho 'nubhavaḥ pratyekam āśrayabhedāt punaḥ ṣaḍvidho bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:506: tatra kāyāvinirbhāvavartitvāt sapratighatvāc cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanendriyāṇi kāye 'ntarbhāvyakāyaśabdenoktānīty ataś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanakāyasaṃsparśānubhavaḥ kāyika ity uktaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:507: manaḥsaṃsparśajas tu caitasika ity ukto manomātrāśrayatvāt //
T06pskvbhu:508: punaḥ vipakṣapratipakṣabhedena pratyekam anubhavasya dvidhā vyavasthānam -- sāmiṣo nirāmiṣa iti ,
T06pskvbhu:512: tasmiṃs tṛṣṇāpriyaikaputropagūḍhanyāyenāviyogam ivecchantī yā pravartate sā āmiṣam /
T06pskvbhu:514: tayā tṛṣṇayā visaṃyuktā viyogānukūlā ca nirāmiṣā /
T06pskvbhu:516: apekṣābhiṣvaṅgaprārthanālakṣaṇena kāmena guṇyante punaḥ punar abhyasyanta iti kāmaguṇāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:521: tatra satkāyavairāgyaṃ purodhāya vipakṣapratipakṣabhāvena sāmiṣanirāmiṣayor vyavasthānam /
T06pskvbhu:523: kimarthaṃ punar atra svarūpata eva bheda ukto nāśrayādibhedena yathānyatra /
T06pskvbhu:524: iha saṅkṣepasya vivakṣitatvāt sarvabhedānāṃ ca svarūpād apṛthaktvād āśrayādibhedena nokta iti //
T06pskvbhu:525: vedanāskandhanirdeśānantaraṃ sañjñāskandhanirdeśāvasara ity ataḥ praśnaḥ -- sañjñā katameti /
T06pskvbhu:532: evaṃ tarhi cakṣurādivijñānasamprayuktā sañjñā viṣayanimittodgrahaṇātmikā na syāt ,
T06pskvbhu:535: anyathā pūrvam agṛhīte viśeṣe paścād api nirūpaṇaṃ na syāt -- nīlametat pītam etad iti /
T06pskvbhu:536: svarūpābhede 'pi bhedaḥ sañjñāyā āśrayata ālambanataś ca ve[p. 30]ditavyaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:544: tatra śabdadvāreṇa yad artharūpam adhyāropitam tena nimittena vastusvarūpaṃ sanimittam /
T06pskvbhu:545: tasmin vastuny adhyāropitaṃ rūpam etac chabdo 'sāv iti yā sañjñā sā sanimittālambanā /
T06pskvbhu:546: animittaṃ punar anadhyāropitākāraṃ vastusvarūpam nirvāṇam bhavāgraṃ ca /
T06pskvbhu:547: tatrādhyāropitanimittābhāvād rūpavedanānimittābhāvād apaṭutvāc caitat trayam animittam ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:548: avyutpannaśabdārthasambandhasya hi rūpasvarūpa eva sañjñā bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:551: nirvāṇadhātur api sarvasaṃskṛtanimittapratyastamitasvarūpa iti tadālambanenāpi samādhinā samprayuktā sañjñā animittālambanā /
T06pskvbhu:555: na punas tatra nimittaṃ naivāstīty animittam /
T06pskvbhu:566: sañjñāskandhanirdeśānantaraṃ saṃskāraskandhanirdeśo nyāyyas tadanantaram uddiṣṭatvād ity ataḥ praśnaḥ -- saṃskārāḥ katame iti /
T06pskvbhu:567: vedanāsañjñābhyām anye caitasikā dharmāś cittaviprayuktāś ceti tannirdeśaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:568: sametya sambhūya pratyayaiḥ kṛtatvāt sarva eva rūpādiskandhasaṅgṛhītā dharmāḥ saṃskārā ity ucyante /
T06pskvbhu:569: iha tu saṃskāraskandhasaṅgṛhītā eva saṃskārā abhipretāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:571: ata eva vedanāsañjñayoḥ sparśamanaskārādibhiś caitasikatvāviśeṣe 'py āha -- vedanāsañjñābhyām anye caitasikā iti /
T06pskvbhu:572: vedanāsañjñayoś caitasikatve saty api vedanāsañjñāskandhasaṅgṛhītatvān na saṃskāraskandhe 'sti saṅgraha iti pradarśanārtham /
T06pskvbhu:574: tathā hi vedanayā śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākam anubhavati /
T06pskvbhu:576: sañjñayā hi dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣv artheṣu nimittam udgṛhya dṛṣṭādiṣu dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātā iti lokaḥ saṃvyavahāre pravartate -- ity ato vedanāsañjñe pṛthakskandhīkṛte ,
T06pskvbhu:578: yadi vedanāsañjñābhyām anye sparśādayo vicārāntāś caitasikā dharmāś cittaviprayuktāś ca prāptyādayaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṅgṛhītāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:586: tathā hi kuśale cittaṃ prerayaty akuśale 'py avyākṛte 'pi sukhaduḥkhādyavasthāsv api cittaṃ prerayatīti /
T06pskvbhu:587: saṃskāravac caitasikā api dharmā na vijñāyanta iti praśnaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:588: ye dharmāś cittena samprayuktā iti vyākaraṇam /
T06pskvbhu:589: te tu na vijñāyanta ity ataḥ pṛcchati /
T06pskvbhu:591: ete 'pi sparśādayo vicārāntāḥ pañcabhir āśrayālambanākārakāladravyasamatāprakāraiś cittānuvartanāt samaṃ prayuktā iti samprayuktāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:592: cittena samprayuktā ity aviśeṣābhidhānāt sarveṣāṃ sarvacittasamprayogaḥ prasakta iti tannirdhāraṇārtham āha -- eṣāṃ pañca sarvatragāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:598: eṣāṃ ya ādyāḥ sparśo manaskāro vedanā sañjñā cetanā ca ,
T06pskvbhu:600: ete hi pañca dharmāḥ sarvaṃ cittam anugacchantīti sarvatragaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:601: tathā hy ete kuśalena traidhātukenānāsraveṇa ca samprayujyante /
T06pskvbhu:602: akuśalena kāmāptena kliṣṭāvyākṛtābhyāṃ ca traidhātukābhyāṃ samprayujyante /
T06pskvbhu:604: trikasannipātaś ca sparśāvyabhicārīty ataḥ sparśasya sarvatragatvam /
T06pskvbhu:606: niranubhavasya nimittodgrahaṇanirapekṣasya ca cittasyābhāvād vedanāsañjñayor api sarvatragatvam /
T06pskvbhu:607: cetanā tu manaskarmaiveti tayāpy avaśyaṃ sarvatra cetasi bhavitavyam -- ity ata ete pañca dharmāḥ sarvatragāḥ //
T06pskvbhu:608: pañca pratiniyataviṣayā iti pratiniyato viṣaya eṣāṃ na sarva iti pratiniyataviṣayāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:609: te punaś chando 'dhimokṣaḥ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā /
T06pskvbhu:612: ete hy āśraddhyādivipakṣatvāt kuśalamūlasamprayogāc ca kuśalāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:613: etair eva ca samprayuktaṃ cittaṃ kuśalam /
T06pskvbhu:614: ṣaṭ kleśāḥ -- rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā [p. 34] dṛṣṭir vicikitsā ca /
T06pskvbhu:618: kaukṛtyādyāś catvāro 'nyatheti vacanād upakleśā avaśiṣṭā ity aviśeṣābhidhāne 'py asamprajanyāvasānā eveti gamyate /
T06pskvbhu:619: kleśāṅgikatvāc cittakleśakaratvāc ca kleśasamīpe vartanta ity upakleśāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:620: kaukṛtyādyāś catvāra iti kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ vitarko vicāraś ca /
T06pskvbhu:621: anyathāpīti na kevalam ete upakleśā eva ,
T06pskvbhu:622: kiṃ tarhi kuśalā apy avyākṛtā apīti /
T06pskvbhu:623: sa eṣa caitasikānāṃ piṇḍaḥ samāsata ekapañcāśad bhavati //
T06pskvbhu:624: eṣāṃ tu pratyekaṃ svarūpaṃ na prajñāyata iti praśnaḥ -- sparśaḥ katamaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:626: iha caitasikānāṃ lakṣaṇata eva nirdeśo na karmato yathānyatra ,
T06pskvbhu:628: vayaṃ tu karmāpy eṣāṃ nirdekṣyāmaḥ sukhāvabodhārtham /
T06pskvbhu:632: trikasamavāyapariccheda iti prakṛtam indriyaviṣayavijñānāni trīṇy eva trikam /
T06pskvbhu:634: tasmin sati tatkālam evendriyasya sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yo vikāraḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:635: tena sadṛśo viṣayasya sukhādivedanīyākāraparicchedo yaḥ sa sparśaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:636: indriyaṃ punar [p. 35] yena viśeṣeṇa sukhaduḥkhādihetutvaṃ pratipadyate sa tasya vikāra indriyavikāraḥ /
T06pskvbhu:637: sādṛśyenendriyaṃ spṛśatīndriyeṇa vā spṛśyata iti sparśaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:639: evaṃ hy uktaṃ sūtre -- sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhā vedaneti //
T06pskvbhu:647: etac ca karma cittasantater ālambananiyamena viśiṣṭaṃ manaskāram adhikṛtyoktam ,
T06pskvbhu:649: yad apy atra nidarśanam ucyate -- samādhilābhī manaskāralābhīty ucyata iti ,
T06pskvbhu:651: anyathā hi sarvasattvā eva manaskāralābhinaḥ syuḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:662: yasyāṃ satyām ālambanaṃ prati cetasaḥ praspando bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:664: āha ca -- kṣaṇāntarānavasthānaṃ nirvyāpāraṃ yayā manaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:671: sa eva cetanā nānya iti jñāpanārtham /
T06pskvbhu:677: evaṃ ca cchandasya pratiniyataviṣayatvaṃ jñāpitam bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:678: darśanaśravaṇādikriyāviṣayatvena yad abhimataṃ vastu tad abhipretam /
T06pskvbhu:689: yuktita āptopadeśād vā yad vastu niḥsandigdhaṃ tan niścitam /
T06pskvbhu:691: tenaivākāreṇa tadvastunaś cetasi niveśanam evam evaitan nānyathety avadhāraṇam adhimokṣaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:693: adhimuktipradhāno hi svasiddhāntāt parapravādibhir apahartuṃ na śakyate /
T06pskvbhu:699: tat pūrvagṛhītasya vastunaḥ punaḥ punar ālambanākārasmaraṇam abhilapanatā /
T06pskvbhu:702: sā punar ālambanābhilapane sati na cittasyālambanāntare ākārāntare vā vikṣepo bhavatīty ato 'vikṣepakarmikā //
T06pskvbhu:706: evaṃ ca samādheḥ pratiniyataviṣayatvam uktaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:721: evam anyeṣv api sāmānyālambaneṣu yathāsambhavaṃ vaktavyam //
T06pskvbhu:725: evaṃ ca samādhivat prajñāpi [p. 39] pratiniyataviṣayety uktaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:727: saṃyag mithyā vā saṅkīrṇasvasāmānyalakṣaṇeṣv iva dharmeṣu vivekāvabodhaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:729: tena triprakāreṇa yo janitaḥ sa yogavihitaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:730: sa punaḥ śrutamayaś cintāmayo bhāvanāmayaś ca /
T06pskvbhu:736: tatra sāṅkhyavaiśeṣikādīnāṃ śrutamayaś cintāmayaś cānāptopadeśajanitatvāt kutarkajanitatvād ayogavihitaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:737: vītarāgānāṃ tu śāśvatocchedavādinām ekatyaśāśvatikādīnāṃ ca mithyāpraṇihitasamādhijanitatvād ayogavihitaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:738: upapattipratilambhiko laukikavyavahārāvabodhaś ca naiva yogavihito nāyogavihitaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:740: saṃśayavyāvartanaṃ tu prajñayā dharmān pravicinvato niścayalābhāt //
T06pskvbhu:756: neśvarādinirmitam iti ya evaṃ karmaphalasvarūpe 'viparīte ca karmaphalavipākayor hetuphalasambandhe 'bhisampratyayaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:759: āryāṇāṃ pratikūlatvād anityatvāditvenāvitathatvāc ca phalabhūtāḥ pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhasatyam /
T06pskvbhu:760: duḥkhahetutvāt pratyayādyākāraiś cāviparītatvād dhetubhūtās ta eva pañcopādānaskandhāḥ samudayasatyam /
T06pskvbhu:763: tatra duḥkhasamudayasatyayor asti duḥkham asti samudaya ity abhisampratyayākāraiva śraddhā /
T06pskvbhu:765: śakyo mayā prāptuṃ nirodho mārgaś cotpādayitum iti //
T06pskvbhu:767: durlabhatvān mahārghatvāt prītikaratvād upakārakaratvād amānuṣādyupaghātapratipakṣatvāc ca ratnānīva ratnāni /
T06pskvbhu:768: tatra durlabhatvaṃ -- bhavabhogeṣv asaktaiḥ kāyajīvitanirapekṣair bodhisattvair nairantaryeṇa bodhisambhāreṣu pravartamānais tribhiḥ kalpāsaṅkhyeyair buddhatvaṃ prāpyata iti durlabham /
T06pskvbhu:770: buddhotpādasya ca durlabhatvād dharmasaṅgharatnayor api durlabhatvaṃ buddhotpādapratibaddhatvāt /
T06pskvbhu:776: saṅgharatnam api sāṃsārikaphalanirvartakaviśiṣṭābhyāṃ puṇyajñānābhyāṃ prāpyata iti mahārgham /
T06pskvbhu:782: amānuṣādyupaghātapraśamanaṃ punar yathoktaṃ sūtre -- saced bho bhikṣavo 'raṇyagatānāṃ veti vistareṇa yāvad yat tad bhaviṣyati bhayaṃ vā chambhitatvaṃ vā romaharṣo vā tat pratigamiṣyatīti /
T06pskvbhu:791: sa ca dviprakāraḥ -- sopadhiśeṣo nirupadhiśeṣaś ca /
T06pskvbhu:794: aṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ saṅghaḥ -- catvāraḥ pratipannāś catvāraśca phalasthāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:796: sarvaguṇadoṣaprakarṣā[p. 43]pakarṣaniṣṭhāgatatvād buddhe bhagavati romāñcāśrupātādisūcitā prasādalakṣaṇā śraddhā /
T06pskvbhu:797: sarvasahetukaduḥkhopaśamātmakatvāt prāpakatvāttaddyotakatvāc ca dharme prasādalakṣanaiva śraddhā /
T06pskvbhu:800: sati vastuni guṇavaty aguṇavati vā sampratyayākārā ,
T06pskvbhu:802: sati guṇavati ca prāptum utpādayituṃ śakye 'bhilāṣākārā /
T06pskvbhu:808: śraddhā hi cittakāluṣyavairodhikīty atas tatsamprayoge kleśopakleśamalakāluṣyavigamāc cittaṃ śraddhām āgamya prasīdatīti cetasaḥ prasāda ucyate
T06pskvbhu:810: na rūpaprasādātmiketi pradarśanārtham āha -- cetasaḥ prasāda iti /
T06pskvbhu:816: yatpratibaddhā yasya kriyāsu pravṛttir nivṛttir vā sa tasyādhipatiḥ svā[p. 44]mītyarthaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:818: sadbhir vigarhitatvād aniṣṭavipākatvāc ca pāpam evāvadyam /
T06pskvbhu:820: kulajñānādibhir guṇaiḥ pāpakriyāyām ātmānam ayogyaṃ matvā ,
T06pskvbhu:821: kathaṃ hi nāma mayaivaṃvidhenaivaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ kriyate kariṣyate vā ,
T06pskvbhu:822: dharme 'py etad aniṣṭavipākatvāt paropaghātapravṛttatvāc ca garhitam -- ity evaṃ yātmānaṃ dharmaṃ cāvekṣamāṇasyāvadyena lajjā ,
T06pskvbhu:828: māṃ caivaṅkarmāṇaṃ viditvā vigarhiṣyantīty aślokādibhayād avadyena lajjate /
T06pskvbhu:831: lajjamānasyāpatrapamāṇasya vā kṛte 'pi duścarite 'vaśyaṃ tadviramaṇād anayos ta[p. 45]tsanniśrayadānakarmakatvam //
T06pskvbhu:836: atra pratipakṣa eva vartate nānyasmin nābhāva iti pradarśanārtham āha -- lobhapratipakṣa iti /
T06pskvbhu:839: lobho nāma bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu ca āsaktiḥ prārthanā ca /
T06pskvbhu:840: tatpratipakṣo 'lobho bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu cānāsaktir vaimukhyaṃ ca /
T06pskvbhu:841: nirvid bhavabhogādīnavānāṃ parijñānād bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu ca vaimukhyam /
T06pskvbhu:843: athavānāgrahaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ nirvidgrahaṇaṃ -- bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu ca vaimukhyākāro yo 'nāgraho 'yam alobha iti /
T06pskvbhu:847: dveṣo hi sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dharmeṣv āghātaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:849: dveṣasyānye 'pi pratipakṣāḥ santīty ata āha -- maitrī /
T06pskvbhu:855: sarva eva hi kuśalā dharmāḥ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāravirodhāt pratipakṣa ity ata āha -- bhūtasampratipattir iti /
T06pskvbhu:857: sā punar dvividhā -- jñānaṃ pratisaṅkhyā ca /
T06pskvbhu:861: tatra dvayoḥ prajñādravyayoḥ samavadhānāsambhavād vīryeṇa samādhinā vā samprayuktā prajñā pratisaṅkhyety ucyate ,
T06pskvbhu:863: ayam atra vākyārthaḥ -- yathābhūtajñānātmakaḥ pratisaṅkhyātmakaś ca jñānaviśeṣo 'moha ity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:871: tatpratipakṣaś ca vīryam ity ataḥ kausīdyavad ubhayaprasaṅge vyavacchedārtham [p. 47] āha -- kuśale cetaso 'bhyutsāho vīryam ,
T06pskvbhu:874: nanu ca kliṣṭaṃ svabhyastatvāt svarasenaiva pravartate /
T06pskvbhu:878: tat punar yatsamprayogāt sannāhe prayoge vālīnatve vāvyāvṛttau vāsantuṣṭau vā kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:888: tatra kāyakarmaṇyatā kāyasya svakāryeṣu laghusamutthānatā yato bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:889: cittakarmaṇyatā samyaṅmanasikāraprayuktasya hlādalāghavanimittaṃ yac caitasikaṃ dharmāntaram /
T06pskvbhu:890: tadyogāc cittam asaktam ālambane pravartata ity atas tac cittakarmaṇyatety ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:891: kāya[p. 48]sya punaḥ spraṣṭavyaviśeṣa eva prītyāhṛtaḥ kāyaprasrabdhir veditavyā /
T06pskvbhu:892: prītamanasaḥ kāyaḥ prasrabhyata iti sūtre vacanāt /
T06pskvbhu:893: atra caitasikādhikārād acaitasiky api kāyaprasrabdhiḥ prasrabdhisambodhyaṅgatvenoktā ,
T06pskvbhu:894: kāyakarmaṇyatā vā cittakarmaṇyatām āvāhayatīty ato 'caitasiky api kāyakarmaṇyatātroktā /
T06pskvbhu:900: pramādo hi yena kleśebhyaś cittaṃ na rakṣati kuśalaṃ ca hāpayati /
T06pskvbhu:901: apramādena punaḥ kleśān prajahāti pratipakṣāṃś ca dharmān bhāvayatīty ato 'pramādaḥ pramādapratipakṣa uktaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:902: alobho yāvad vīryam ity alobhādveṣāmohāḥ saha vīryeṇa gṛhyante /
T06pskvbhu:903: yān alobhādīn vīryaparyantān niśrityāgamya prāpyākuśalān dharmān prajahātīty anena sarve alobhādayo 'pramāda ity uktaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:904: akuśalā dharmā āsravā āsravasthānīyāś ca viṣayā veditavyāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:911: yasmād vīryasahītān alobhādīn niśrityākuśalān dharmān prajahāti tatpratipakṣāṃś ca dharmān bhāvayati ,
T06pskvbhu:912: tasmāt savīryeṣv alobhādiṣv apramādaḥ prajñapyate -- ity anena sādhiṣṭhānā sakāraṇā cāpramādasya prajñaptir uktā /
T06pskvbhu:917: sa evālobho yāvad vīryam ityādi -- apramāda ivātrāpi vyākhyānam /
T06pskvbhu:918: cittasamatādibhis tribhiḥ padair upekṣāyā ādimadhyāvasānāvasthā dyotitā /
T06pskvbhu:921: tato 'nabhisaṃskāreṇāprayatnena samāhitasya cetaso yathāyogaṃ samasyaiva pravṛttiḥ praśaṭhatā /
T06pskvbhu:924: tato bhāvanāprakarṣagamanāt tadvipakṣadūrībhāvāt tacchaṅkābhāve layauddhatyapratipakṣani[p. 50]mitteṣv ābhogam akurvato 'nābhogāvasthatā cittasyānābhogatā
T06pskvbhu:929: upekṣā hi saṅkliṣṭavihāravairodhikīty avaśyaṃ tayā rāgādipravṛttivibandhe vartitavyam ity atas tayā nirvāsiteṣv ity uktam /
T06pskvbhu:951: upādīyate 'nayā tṛṣṇayā tribhavotpattiḥ paunarbhavikaṃ vā karmeti tṛṣṇāyā upādānākhyā /
T06pskvbhu:952: upādānasambhūtatvād upādānavidheyatvād upādānāni vā tebhyaḥ sambhavantīty upādānaskandhāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:954: yathā hi tailādikaḥ sneho vastrādikam āśrayam anupraviśya vyāpnoti ,
T06pskvbhu:956: evaṃ rāgo 'pi svālambanam anupraviśyaiva vyāpnoti mahatāpi ca prayāsena tasmādālambanāt durvivecya iti sneha ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:958: athavā spraṣṭavyaviśeṣo 'pi sneha iti vyavacchedārtham āha -- adhyavasānam iti /
T06pskvbhu:960: triduḥkhatāyogād yathāsambhavaṃ traidhātukāḥ pañca skandhā duḥkham abhipretam tasya ca duḥkhasya kāmarūpārūpyatṛṣṇāvaśenābhinirvṛttito rāgasya duḥkhasañjananaṃ karma nirdiśyate //
T06pskvbhu:963: āghātaḥ sattveṣu rūkṣacittatā yenāviṣṭaḥ sattvānāṃ vadhabandhādikam anarthaṃ cintayati /
T06pskvbhu:972: pratihatacittasya ca na kiñcid duścaritaṃ vidūr -- iti pratigho 'sparśavihāraduścaritasanniśrayadānakarmaka uktaḥ //
T06pskvbhu:975: māno hi sarva eva satkāyadṛṣṭisanniśrayeṇa pravartate ,
T06pskvbhu:977: tathā hy ātmātmīyabhāvaṃ skandheṣv adhyāropyāyam aham idaṃ mamety ātmānaṃ tena tena viśeṣeṇonnamayati anyebhyo 'dhikaṃ manyate /
T06pskvbhu:979: agauravaṃ guruṣu guṇavatsu ca pudgaleṣu stabdhatā kāyavācor apasṛtatā /
T06pskvbhu:981: sa punaś cittonnatisvabhāvābhede 'pi cittonnatinimittabhedāt saptadhā bhidyate -- māno 'timāna ity evamādi //
T06pskvbhu:982: hīnāt kulavijñānavittādibhiḥ śreyān asmi kulavijñānavittādibhir iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:983: sadṛśena vā kulādibhis tair eva sadṛśo 'smīti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:985: atimānaḥ kulavijñānavittādibhiḥ sadṛśāt tyāgaśīlapauruṣādibhiḥ śreyān a[p. 53]smi ,
T06pskvbhu:986: śreyasā vā kulavittādibhiḥ sadṛśo 'smi vijñānavittādibhir iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:988: mānātimānaḥ śreyasaḥ kulavijñānavittair aham eva śreyān kulavijñānavittair iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:996: ata etad eva dvayamupādānam ity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1000: abhimāno 'prāpta uttariviśeṣādhigame prāpto mayeti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1005: tasmin viśeṣādhigama 'prāpte sati prāpto mayā uttariviśeṣādhigama iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1007: ūnamāno bahvantaraviśiṣṭāt kulavidyāvittādibhir alpāntarahīno 'smi kulādibhir iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1010: viśiṣṭād vā viśiṣṭa ity unnatisthānatvān mānaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1011: ātmānaṃ tu nyūnaṃ paśyataḥ kim unnatisthānaṃ ,
T06pskvbhu:1013: etad evonnatisthānaṃ bahvantaraviśiṣṭād alpāntarahīno 'smi na yathābahvantarahīnād iti /
T06pskvbhu:1014: api ca santi kecid ye prakṛṣṭe ca sattvarāśau hīnam apy ātmānaṃ bahu manyante /
T06pskvbhu:1021: aguṇavata iti -- anena hi dānaśīlādyabhāve guṇavattvam abhyupagataṃ bhavatīty ato nirvastukatvān mithyāmāna ucyate //
T06pskvbhu:1027: karmaṇy ajñānaṃ puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyakarmāstitve yad ajñānam apratipattir anavabodhaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1029: puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyakarmāstitve vicikitsato vāpavadato vā nāsti puṇyam apuṇyam āniñjyaṃ ceti ,
T06pskvbhu:1031: paśubandhāgnipraveśādike vāpuṇye puṇyasañjñināṃ yā vicikitsāmithyādṛṣṭisamprayuktā avidyā ,
T06pskvbhu:1034: prajñā nitīraṇātmikā dṛṣṭir ucyata ity ato laukikīsaṃyagdṛṣṭyādiprasaṅge dṛṣṭir iti satkāyadṛṣṭyādikāḥ pañca dṛṣṭaya ihābhipretā iti pradarśann āha -- pañca dṛṣṭaya iti /
T06pskvbhu:1035: tāsāṃ kliṣṭatvāviśeṣe 'py ā[p. 56]lambanākārabhedād bhedapradarśanārthaṃ punar apy āha -- satkāyadṛṣṭir antagrāhadṛṣṭir iti vistaraḥ //
T06pskvbhu:1038: vinaśvare saṅghāte iyaṃ dṛṣṭir nātmani nātmīye ceti jñāpitaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1039: ātmā hi nityaś caikaś cātmavādibhir abhyupagamyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1041: pañcopādānaskandhān ityādi -- ye kecic chramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmānam ātmīyaṃ veti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti ,
T06pskvbhu:1042: ta imān eva pañcopādānaskandhān iti sūtra uktam /
T06pskvbhu:1043: te hi svarūpataḥ kāryato vā ātmānaṃ prajñapayeyuḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1045: te ca cittacaitasikaprabhede 'vidvāṃsaḥ sakalaṃ cittacaitasikakalāpam eva caitanyam ity āhuḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1046: atas te caturaḥ skandhān ātmeti pratipannāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1048: na ca buddhivṛttito 'nyac caitanyaṃ svasthacittena śakyate vaktuṃ pratipattum vā /
T06pskvbhu:1049: evam vedanādīnām ekeṣāṃ ca nirgranthānāṃ jñānasvarūpa ātmeti teṣām ātmātmīyagrāho 'nantarokta eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1050: vaiśeṣikādayas tu kāryata ātmānaṃ vyapadiśanti -- yaḥ paśyati yāvan manyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1051: tathā yo vedayate [p. 57] jānāti smarati cetayate vijānāti ca ,
T06pskvbhu:1058: yatra tarhi cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati naiva durmanā iti ,
T06pskvbhu:1061: sa eva cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvety ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1075: ātmalābhānantaraṃ ca bhāvānāṃ nirhetukatvād yadi vināśo na syāt ,
T06pskvbhu:1078: sahetukavināśaparikalpe ca vinaṣṭaiva tadvyatirikto vā vinā[p. 58]śahetuḥ parikalpyeta /
T06pskvbhu:1082: sa paścād api tasya naiva kāraṇam ,
T06pskvbhu:1084: itarasminn api pakṣe vināśānāṃ kāraṇaniyamo na syāt /
T06pskvbhu:1085: kāryāṇām iva tadvināśānām api kāraṇaniyamo bhaviṣyati /
T06pskvbhu:1087: kāryāṇāṃ hi parasparato bhinnasvarūpatvāt tatkāraṇānām api śaktibhedāt niyamo na virudhyate /
T06pskvbhu:1088: vināśānāṃ tu nirupākhyatvād ātmātiśayābhāve kiṅkṛto 'yaṃ niyamaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1091: vināśaś ca yadi vināśakāraṇāt pūrvam apy asti ,
T06pskvbhu:1093: bhāvānāṃ ca vināśe saty utpattir iti vinaṣṭānām apy utpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1095: evaṃ sati bhāvavad abhāvasyāpi prāgabhāvaḥ prajyate /
T06pskvbhu:1098: evaṃ bhāvābhāvayor aviśeṣāt sarvaṃ bhāvātmakam abhāvātmakam vā prasajyeta /
T06pskvbhu:1102: evaṃ sati bhā[p. 59]vapradhvaṃsābhāvasyāpi naiveṣṭavyā dvayor apy ātmātiśayatvābhāvāt /
T06pskvbhu:1105: ātmaivātmanaḥ kartā karma ceti na yujyate /
T06pskvbhu:1111: kriyārahitāc ca kriyādhyāsito 'nya eveti kathaṃ kartuḥ karmaṇo vātmabhūtā /
T06pskvbhu:1114: evam api tasya kartṛtvaṃ kriyāyāś ca tadātmabhūtatvaṃ na yujyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1118: kartur abhāvāc ca kriyāyā apy abhāva iti ,
T06pskvbhu:1119: evaṃ ca svarasavināśāt kṣaṇikatvam evābhyupagataṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1123: na ca niḥkriyaṃ karma kartā vā yujyata ity avaśyaṃ tatrānyayā kriyayā bhavitavyam ,
T06pskvbhu:1124: tatrāpy anyayety anavasthā kriyāṇāṃ kartṝṇāṃ ca /
T06pskvbhu:1126: evaṃ tarhi dravyam eva [p. 60] kriyāntararahitaṃ janyatvena kiṃ neṣyate /
T06pskvbhu:1143: atha kriyaiva svāśrayasya vikārahetur iti pūrvāvasthāto vikṛtatvam apratiṣiddham /
T06pskvbhu:1146: tasmād avaśyaṃ pūrvottarayor yaugapadyābhāvāt pūrvavināśenābhinnakālam uttarasyotpādo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1147: evaṃ kriyāyā āśrayābhāvād anavasthitatvāt kuto vikārahetutvam /
T06pskvbhu:1148: tasmād ātmalābhānantaravināśeṣu nirīheṣv antarvyāpārapuruṣarahiteṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣv eva sadbhāvamātreṇa prāgabhūtānām anyeṣāṃ skandhānāṃ hetubhāvena vyavasthiteṣu nityakartṛbhoktṛgrāhapūrvako 'yam ātmātmīyagrāhaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1153: na hy amūḍhasyānātmany ātmeti jñānaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1163: śāśvatata ucchedato veti -- yat satkāyadṛṣṭyātmatvena vastv ālambitam ,
T06pskvbhu:1166: samanupaśyato yā kliṣṭā prajñeti pūrvavad vācyam /
T06pskvbhu:1169: [p. 62] hetum vāpavadataḥ phalaṃ vā kriyāṃ vā sad vā vastu nāśayata ityādi -- sucaritādikam ,
T06pskvbhu:1177: tām eva ca trividhāṃ dṛṣṭim iti satkāyadṛṣṭim antagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ ca /
T06pskvbhu:1185: dṛṣṭilakṣaṇasyābhiniveśasya guṇarūpeṇa grahaṇāt tadaparityāgamukhena sarvadṛṣṭīnām ayaṃ sanniśraya ity uktaṃ bhava[p. 63]ti //
T06pskvbhu:1189: yān āśritya skandhāñ chīlaṃ vrataṃ vā pravartate ,
T06pskvbhu:1191: kutsitāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ guṇato gṛhītvā tatpūrvakaṃ śīlaṃ vrataṃ vā paratvenāmṛśatīti śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1192: ata eva śīlavrataparāmarśād dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ pūrva uktaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1193: śudhyate 'nena vā pāpācayanāt (?) śīlena vratena ceti śuddhiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1196: niryāṇam eva nairyāṇiko mokṣamārga ity arthaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1198: śīle vrate vā śuddhyādyākārair abhiniveśātmikā prajñā śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1204: dvidhā matir vimatiḥ -- syān na syād [p. 64] iti /
T06pskvbhu:1207: kleśānāṃ ca rāgādīnāṃ kati parikalpitā eva ,
T06pskvbhu:1208: kati sahajāḥ parikalpitāś cety āha -- tisro dṛṣṭayaḥ parikalpitāḥ eveti /
T06pskvbhu:1209: tās tu pūrvā api santīty ata āha paścimā iti /
T06pskvbhu:1210: tāḥ punar mithyādṛṣṭir dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaś ca /
T06pskvbhu:1220: apakāram āgamyety apakāraṃ gṛhītvety anena krodhasya viṣayaṃ nirūpayati /
T06pskvbhu:1221: krodho hy apakāravastuny eva vartamāna eva pravartate ,
T06pskvbhu:1223: cetasa āghāta ity atrāpi vijñānasambandhitvaṃ svarūpaṃ ca nirūpitam /
T06pskvbhu:1227: vartamānam apakāram adhikṛtya yaś cetasa āghātaḥ sattvāsattvaviṣayo daṇḍādānādisanniśrayadānakarmakaś ca sa krodha iti prajñapyate //
T06pskvbhu:1228: krodhād ūrdhvaṃ mamānenedam apakṛtam ity etasya vairātmakasyāśayasyānubandho 'nutsargaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1233: ayaṃ ca krodhavat pradveṣāvasthāviśeṣe prajñapyata iti prajñaptisan veditavyaḥ //
T06pskvbhu:1234: chandadveṣabhayādīṃs tiraskṛtya kāle taddhitaiṣiṇā codakena tvam evaṅkārīty anuyuktasya mohāṃśiky avadyapracchādanā mrakṣaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1238: kaukṛtyāc cāvaśyaṃ daurmanasyena samprayogād asparśavihāra iti //
T06pskvbhu:1244: ayaṃ ca krodhopanāhapūrvaṅgamaś cetasa āghātasvabhāva iti pratighāṃśika eveti na dravyato vidyate /
T06pskvbhu:1247: ābhasatkārakulaśīlaśrutādīn guṇān upalabhya dveṣāṃśikaś cetaso vyāroṣa īrṣyā /
T06pskvbhu:1250: upāttaṃ vastu dharmāmiṣakauśalātmakaṃ yena pūjānugrahakāmyayārthine 'narthine vā dīyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1253: lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya jīvitopakaraṇeṣu rāgāṃśikaś cetasa āgraho 'parityāgecchā mātsaryam /
T06pskvbhu:1255: asaṃlekhaḥ punar mātsaryeṇānupayujyamānānām apy upakaraṇānāṃ sannicayād veditavyaḥ //
T06pskvbhu:1257: lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya paravañcanābhiprāyeṇānyathā vyavasthitasya śīlāder arthasyānyathā prakāśanā /
T06pskvbhu:1258: iyaṃ ca yābhyāṃ rāgamohābhyām abhūtān guṇān prakāśayate tayoḥ samuditayoḥ prajñapyate -- iti krodhādivat prajñaptita eva ,
T06pskvbhu:1262: na ca vyāyāmalabdhā iti mithyājīva ucyate //
T06pskvbhu:1266: tat punar anyenānyat pratisarati kṣipaty aparisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate /
T06pskvbhu:1271: yasya yogāc cittam ṛjumārgaṃ na pratipadyate /
T06pskvbhu:1272: idaṃ ca lābhasatkārādhyavasito yābhyāṃ rāgamohābhyāṃ svadoṣapracchādanārthaṃ paramohanāya pravartate ,
T06pskvbhu:1280: harṣaviśeṣam eva vyācaṣṭe -- cetasaḥ paryādānam iti /
T06pskvbhu:1281: yena harṣaviśeṣeṇa cittam asvatantrīkṛtaṃ tena tad ātmatantrīkaraṇāt paryāttaṃ bhavatītyata uktam -- cetasaḥ paryādānam iti /
T06pskvbhu:1282: eṣa saṅkṣepo harṣaviśeṣasahitas tṛṣṇāprakāro mada iti /
T06pskvbhu:1285: viheṭhyante 'nayā sattvā vadhabandhanādibhir duḥkhadaurmanasyotpādanād iti viheṭhanā /
T06pskvbhu:1286: sā punaḥ pratighāṃśikā nirghṛṇatā niṣkaruṇatā nirdayatā ca /
T06pskvbhu:1287: etāś ca nirghṛṇatādayaḥ svayaṃ vadhādiṃ kurvataḥ kārayataḥ paraiś ca kriyamāṇān dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vānumodataś ca yathākramaṃ boddhavyāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1289: eṣa tu saṅkṣepaḥ -- pratighāṃśikā sattveṣu cittarūkṣatā sattvaviheṭhanakarmikāvihiṃsety ucyate //
T06pskvbhu:1293: tasmin karmaṇy ātmanam ayogyam avekṣyamāṇasyāpi yāvadyenālajjā ,
T06pskvbhu:1301: rāgadveṣamohaprakāreṣu sarvasatkāyaprasavahetuṣu rāgadveṣayor ayaugapadyād yathāsambhavaṃ prajñapyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1306: yadyogāc cittaṃ jaḍībhāvāt stimitam iva bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:1314: sa punā rāgānukūlaḥ pūrvahasitaramitakrīḍitādy anusmarato rāgāṃśikaś cetaso 'vyupaśamahetuḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1321: kuśale kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmaṇi nidrāpārśvaśayanasukham āgamya yo mohāṃśikaś cetaso 'nabhyutsāhaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1335: kuśalasyānabhilapanateti -- na hi kleśasamprayuktā smṛtiḥ kleśenābhinnaviṣayatvāt kuśalam abhilapituṃ samarthā /
T06pskvbhu:1338: yai rāgadveṣamohaiś cittaṃ samādhyālambanād bahir visāryate ,
T06pskvbhu:1349: abhipretam anabhipretaṃ kuśalam akuśalam avyākṛtaṃ kāle 'kāle yuktam ayuktaṃ ca kṛtvākṛtvā vā mohāṃśikaś cetaso vipratisāraḥ kaukṛtyam /
T06pskvbhu:1353: anabhipretaṃ punaḥ parair balād avaṣṭabhya yat kāryate ,
T06pskvbhu:1369: anyato 'py asvatantrā vṛttiś cetaso bhavatīty ata āha -- cetaso 'bhisaṅkṣepa iti /
T06pskvbhu:1370: anyato 'py abhisaṅkṣepaś cetasa ity asvatantravṛttiś cetasa ity āha /
T06pskvbhu:1381: cetanāprajñāviśeṣa iti cetanāyāś cittaparispandātmakatvāt prajñāyāś ca guṇadoṣavivekākāratvāt /
T06pskvbhu:1399: cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā idānīṃ vaktavyā ity ata āha -- cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ katama iti //
T06pskvbhu:1400: praśnavat sāmānyatas tannirdeśaḥ -- ye rūpacittacaitasikāvasthāsu prajñapyante tattvānyatvataś ca na prajñapyante ,
T06pskvbhu:1401: te viprayuktāḥ saṃskārā iti prakaraṇāt sambadhyate /
T06pskvbhu:1403: ata eva svopādānāt tattvānyatvenāvasthāvan na prajñapyante ,
T06pskvbhu:1405: sāmānyanirdeśād viśeṣānavagamād viśeṣabubhutsayā pra[p. 75]śnaḥ te punaḥ katama iti /
T06pskvbhu:1411: pravṛttiḥ pratiniyamo yogo javo 'nukramaḥ kālo deśaḥ saṅkhyā sāmagrī cety evamādayaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1412: idānīṃ sāmagryādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ svarūpanirdhāraṇārthaṃ praśnaḥ -- prāptiḥ katamety evamādiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1414: tat kilāyam (?) aprāptapūrvasya prathamataḥ prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1417: evaṃ ca prāptiśabdaḥ pratilambhe samanvāgame ca vartata iti jñāpitaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1418: sā punar bījaṃ vaśitā sammukhībhāvaś ceti tridhā bhidyate yathāyogam iti /
T06pskvbhu:1419: tatrāyaṃ yogaḥ -- prathamāt kṣaṇād ārabhya prāptir yāvad vaśitāvasthaṃ bījam ucyata iti pratilambhasamanvāgamau bījākhyau bhavataḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1422: kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtair dharmair āhito vijñāne 'nāgatatajjātīyadharmahetuḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣo bījam /
T06pskvbhu:1423: bīje hi labdhe tadāyattatvād asammukhībhūtam api yasya tad bījaṃ tatprāptam ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1424: vaśitā punas tasya pra[p. 76]tyayān apekṣyāpratibandhena svakāryanirvartanāvasthā /
T06pskvbhu:1426: asañjñā vā samāpattir asañjñisamāpattir asañjñānām vā samāpattir ity asañjñisamāpattiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1433: nordhvaṃ tṛtīyād dhyānād ūrdhvaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam ,
T06pskvbhu:1438: āsañjñike mokṣasañjñinaḥ samāpattau vā tanmārgasañjñino 'sañjñisamāpattiṃ samāpadyante /
T06pskvbhu:1441: ata eva sarvacittacaittanirodhe 'pi sañjñābhāva eva nirdiśyate 'sañjñisamāpattir iti /
T06pskvbhu:1442: tathā hi sañjñām eva vidū[p. 77]ṣayan niravaśeṣacittacaittanirodhaṃ prāpnoti /
T06pskvbhu:1445: sarvāsv acittikāsv avasthāsv abhāvāt sacittikāsv apy avasthāsu ye na sarvadā bhavanti te 'sthāvarāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1449: anāsravamārgasatyasamāpattyavasthāṃ nirodhasamāpattyavasthām aśaikṣāvasthāṃ ca hitvānyāsu sarvāsv avasthāsu bhāvāt -- ity asthāvarāṇām iti viśeṣaṇam
T06pskvbhu:1450: yo nirodha iti samāpatticittakṛtaḥ kālāntaram asthāvaracittacaittasamudācāravirodhy āśrayasyāvasthāviśeṣaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1452: evaṃ cāśrayāvasthāviśeṣe asañjñisamāpattiḥ prajñapyata ity uktaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1456: bhavāgrād anuccalito 'py asty ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjana ity ata āha -- bhavāgrāduccalitasyeti /
T06pskvbhu:1457: bhavāgrād uccalita ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgo 'py asti kaścit phalasthaḥ pratipannakaś ca bhavāgrād uccalita ākiñcanyāyatanād avītarāgo 'py asti kaścit phalasthaḥ pratipannakaś cety ata āha -- ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasyeti /
T06pskvbhu:1460: ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya bhavāgrād uccalitasyety ubhayābhidhānena āryasyaiveyam anāgāmino 'rhato vā samāpattiḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1467: vihārasañjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇeti na [p. 79] hi nirodhasamāpattim asañjñāsamāpattim iva niḥsaraṇasañjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa samāpadyante
T06pskvbhu:1475: nirvāṇasadṛśena samāpattiviśeṣeṇa vihariṣyāma ity anayā sañjñayā saṃskṛto manasikāro vihārasañjñāpūrvako manasikāra ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1478: asthāvarāṇām iti ṣaṇṇāṃ pravṛttivijñānānāṃ caturṇām ekasya kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu yathākramaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpadyamānānām /
T06pskvbhu:1480: sthāvarā iti vipākavijñānasaṅgṛhītā api santīty ata āha -- ekatīyānām iti /
T06pskvbhu:1481: kliṣṭasya ca manasaḥ sarvasmin sāsrave cāre sthānaśīlatvāt sthāvaratvam anyatra nirodhasamāpattyaśaikṣāvasthayoḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1482: nirodha iti samāpattivijñānakṛto vipākavijñāne pravṛttivijñānānāṃ kliṣṭasya ca manaso bījopaghātaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1483: nirudhyate 'nena pravṛttivijñānaṃ kliṣṭaṃ [p. 80] ca manaḥ kālāntaram apravṛttita iti nirodha ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1485: āsañjñikam asañjñisamāpatteḥ phalam asañjñisattveṣu deveṣūpapannasyāsthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo nirodhaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1486: bṛhatphalā nāma devāś caturthe dhyāne tṛtīyaṃ sthānāntaram /
T06pskvbhu:1487: teṣāṃ parigaṇā ivopary asañjñisattvānāṃ devānāṃ sthānaṃ ,
T06pskvbhu:1489: asthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaittānāṃ yo nirodha iti tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇam /
T06pskvbhu:1490: tatra hy upapannasyāsthāvarāś cittacaittāḥ svāśraye svajātīyacittacaittabījopaghāte vartamānāḥ kṣāmakṣāmatarā utpadyante ,
T06pskvbhu:1491: yāvad ante 'tikṣāmatāṃ gatāś cittāntaraṃ sambandhuṃ na śaknuvanti ,
T06pskvbhu:1496: jīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgeṣu pūrvakarmāviddho yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthitikālaniyama iti /
T06pskvbhu:1503: teṣu ca nikāyasabhāgeṣu gatibhedena karmabhedena ca bhinneṣu pratyekam ekajānmiko yaḥ skandhasantānaḥ,
T06pskvbhu:1508: tasyāḥ sthiteḥ kālaniyama iyantaṃ kālam anenāsmin nikāyasabhāge sthātavyaṃ varṣaśataṃ varṣasahasraṃ vety ayaṃ sthitikālaniyamaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1509: evaṃ ca sthitikālaniyamasvabhāvam āyurity uktaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1510: adhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tasya sthāvarāḥ saṃskārā ālayavijñānapū[p. 82]rvakāḥ pūrvajanmopacitena karmaṇākṣiptasāmarthyaviśeṣā iti //
T06pskvbhu:1517: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- gatisthānātmabhāvādibhedena bhinnānāṃ sattvānāṃ gatisthānātmabhāvabhedanibandhanaṃ sattvānāṃ yat paraspareṇātmabhāvasādṛśyam
T06pskvbhu:1519: jātir nikāyasabhāge yaḥ saṃskārāṇām abhūtvā bhāvaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1524: ye bhāvānām anutpannāvinaṣṭānām arthāntarabhūtāṃ jātiṃ kāritrataś cādhvavyavasthāṃ pratipannāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1526: svarūpasyaiva hi saṃskārāṇām abhūtvā bhāvo jātiḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1529: tathaiva teṣām iti nikāyasabhāgapatitānām eva saṃskārāṇām /
T06pskvbhu:1531: tatrāntare hetuphalabhāvenāvasthitānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nairantaryeṇotpādaḥ prabandha ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1533: tathā hi kalalāvasthāto 'rbudāvasthety evaṃ yāvan vṛddhāvasthā /
T06pskvbhu:1534: kalalādyavasthāsv api pūrvasmād uttarasya pratikṣaṇam anyathābhāvo vācyaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1539: ā maraṇāt saṃskārāṇāṃ prabandhavṛttau sthitir iti prajñaptiḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1540: naikasya kṣaṇasya nāpy arthāntarabhūteti jñāpitaṃ bhavati //
T06pskvbhu:1542: tathaiva teṣām iti -- ekasmin nikāyasabhāge saṃskārāṇāṃ prabandhoparame 'nityatā prajñapyate /
T06pskvbhu:1543: na pratikṣaṇaṃ nāpy arthāntarabhūte tad bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1545: nanu ca bāhyasyāpi rūpasya jātijarāsthityani[p. 84]tyatāḥ santi /
T06pskvbhu:1546: tat kimarthaṃ nikāyasabhāga eva saṃskārasantānasya jātyādaya uktāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1548: yānīmāni bhagavatā saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānīty uktāni jātir jarā sthitir anityatā ca ,
T06pskvbhu:1549: tāni sattvākhyān eva saṃskārān ādhikṛtya na bāhyān iti jñāpanārtham /
T06pskvbhu:1550: kasmāt punar bhagavatā ubhayeṣām api tulye jātisattve upāttān eva saṃskārān adhikṛtya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāny uktāni /
T06pskvbhu:1553: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- vināśotpādau bāhyasya rūpasya saṃvartavivartaśabdena loke prasiddhāv iti bhagavatāpi lokam anuvartamānena tathaivoktau,
T06pskvbhu:1555: ādhyātmikās tu saṃskārā jātijarādiprabhāvitāḥ -- jātā jīrṇāḥ sthitā vinaṣṭā iti teṣāṃ bhagavatāpi lokānuvṛttyotpādādayo jātyādiśabdena nirdiṣṭā iti //
T06pskvbhu:1557: abhidheyam abhidheyaṃ prati jñānaṃ nāmayatīti nāma /
T06pskvbhu:1564: tadyathā cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ rūpaṃ śabda iti //
T06pskvbhu:1567: evaṃ nāmno laukikāc ca padāt padaṃ viśeṣitaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1568: nāmapadayoḥ varṇasamudāyātmakatvāviśeṣe 'py arthaviśeṣād viśeṣaḥ -- dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvādhivacanaṃ nāma ,
T06pskvbhu:1584: ubhayaśabdād api kevalāt katamasyobhayasyeti na vijñāyate /
T06pskvbhu:1586: evam anantarasyaiva nāmnaḥ padasya cābhivyañjakatvād vyañjanam ity uktaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1589: evam akṣarair nāmapadābhivyañjanā akṣarāṇi na vāgvijñaptisvabhāvāni /
T06pskvbhu:1593: tadavastheṣv eva nāmapadayoḥ prajñaptir iti te tadāśrayatvenocyante /
T06pskvbhu:1597: na punar evam akārasya paryāyāntaram asti ,
T06pskvbhu:1601: tat sarvam ebhir anuvyavahriyata ity ata ete nāmapadavyañjanakāyā vyavasthāpitā iti /
T06pskvbhu:1602: evam anyeṣām api viprayuktānāṃ nāmapadavyañjanakāyavat prayojanāpekṣayā vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam //
T06pskvbhu:1604: yasya dharmasya yogāt pṛthagjana ity ākhyāyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1606: ārād yātāḥ pāpakebhyo 'kuśalebhyo dharmebhya ity āryāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1611: tathā hy anutpannāryadharmaḥ sattvasantānaḥ pṛthagjana ity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1619: aniṣṭasya duścaritam ityādi phalānāṃ pṛthag anyonyahetutā //
T06pskvbhu:1622: tadyathā dānasya bhogasampad anurūpeti yujyate dānasya bhogasampat phalam //
T06pskvbhu:1630: hetuphalayoḥ prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yat tatra hetuphalam utpannaniruddham ,
T06pskvbhu:1635: pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsu sarvato daśasu dikṣu hetuphala eva deśa iti prajñaptiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1644: evam ete cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā dharmāṇām avasthāviśeṣeṣu prajñapyanta iti prajñaptisanto veditavyāḥ //
T06pskvbhu:1646: saṃskāraskandhānantaraṃ vijñānaskandho veditavya ity ata āha -- vijñānaskandhaḥ katama iti /
T06pskvbhu:1651: tasya vijñaptir grahaṇam avabodhaḥ pratipattir ity arthaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1656: vijñānasvarūpam uktvā tatparyāyapradarśanārtham āha -- cittaṃ mano 'pi tad iti /
T06pskvbhu:1662: tatra pravṛttivijñānasyālambanaprativijñaptisvarūpatvād ālambanasya ca prativijñānam anekākāratvāc cakṣurādivijñānaṃ citram utpadyate /
T06pskvbhu:1663: ata eva tadindriyāśrayeṇāpy [p. 90] utpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātīty ucyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1665: tathā ṣaṇṇāṃ cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ yad yannirudhyate tat tad anantarasya vijñānasyotpadyamānasyāśrayabhāvena vyavatiṣṭhata ity ataḥ samanantaracittasanniśrayatām upādāya mana ity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1666: yad etac citratvāc cittam ity uktam ,
T06pskvbhu:1669: lakṣaṇaṃ tu pratiniyatālambanākāratvān na citram iti na tat prādhānyena cittam /
T06pskvbhu:1671: atraiva kāraṇam āha -- tathā hi tac citaṃ sarvasaṃskārabījair iti /
T06pskvbhu:1672: pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvasaṃskārabījaiś citatvāc cittam iti prādhānyena tad eva cittam /
T06pskvbhu:1673: cayas tu paunaḥpunyena bījaparipoṣaḥ saṃskārabījānusyūtir vā /
T06pskvbhu:1677: paunaḥpunyena saṃskārāṇāṃ samudācārād bījapuṣṭir vāsanety ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1681: tathā hi sūtre 'py uktam [p. 91] -- cakṣur aparibhinnaṃ bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:1686: hetupratyayas tu sadā sannihitatvād durvijñeyatvāc ca noktaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1690: tatra ca viṣayāt saṅkliśyate vyavadāyate vā /
T06pskvbhu:1691: tadavasthaś ca puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyān saṃskārāṃś cetanātmakān abhisaṃskaroti /
T06pskvbhu:1692: te 'bhisaṃskṛtā nirudhyamānā ālayavijñāne vipākavāsanāṃ vā puṣṇanti niṣyandavāsanāṃ vā /
T06pskvbhu:1693: tatra niṣyandavāsanām āgamyālayavijñānāt puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyāḥ saṃskārāḥ pravartante /
T06pskvbhu:1694: vipākavāsanām āgamyālayavijñānān nikāyasabhāgāntareṣv ālayavijñānam eva vipākātmakaṃ nirvartate /
T06pskvbhu:1695: tatra ye 'py anye 'kuśalāḥ kuśalasāsravāś ca dharmās teṣām apy ayam eva nayaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1701: tathā hi sarvasaṃskārāḥ svabījādhāne vartamānā ālayavijñānātmātiśayahetu[p. 92]bhāvena vyavatiṣṭhanta iti sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ tat kāryam /
T06pskvbhu:1702: sarvasaṃskārāś ca tadbījopādānād ālayavijñānād utpadyanta iti sarvasaṃskārāṇām ālayavijñānaṃ kāraṇam /
T06pskvbhu:1703: vipākavāsanāṃ tv adhikṛtya kuśalākuśalānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kāryam eva tat na ,
T06pskvbhu:1705: kāraṇaṃ tu tad vipākavāsanām upādāya nikāyasabhāgāntareṣu vipākavijñānasyaiveti //
T06pskvbhu:1706: pravṛttivijñānaṃ hi rūpaśabdādyālambanatvāt svasāmānyalakṣaṇākāratvāc ca paricchinnālambanaṃ paricchinnākāraṃ ca /
T06pskvbhu:1715: etac cālambanaṃ sūkṣmatvāl lokapaṇḍitair api duravadhāram ity ato 'paricchinnālambanākāram ity ucyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1718: tatra na tāvat kuśalākuśalajātīyaṃ kuśalākuśalair asamprayogāt /
T06pskvbhu:1719: tad dhi pañcabhir eva sarvatragaiś caitasaiḥ samprayujyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1721: ālayavijñānaṃ sasamprayogaṃ pūrvakarmasaṃskārahetukatvād ekāntena vipāka evety avyākṛtajātīyam eva //
T06pskvbhu:1722: santānānuvṛtti ca atra hy ālayavijñānaṃ nikāyasabhāgāntareṣu pratisandhim upādāya yāvac cyutiṃ tāvat kṣaṇaprabandhapravāhena vartate ,
T06pskvbhu:1734: nāpy ekaṃ dravyam ā maraṇād anuvartata iti //
T06pskvbhu:1735: ṣaṭprakārapravṛttivijñānavyatiriktam anyad ālayavijñānam a[p. 94]stīti katham vijñāyate /
T06pskvbhu:1737: tatrāgama -- uktaṃ bhagavatābhidharmasūtre anādikāliko dhātuḥ sarvadharmasamāśrayaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1738: tasmin sati gatiḥ sarvā nirvāṇādhigamo 'pi ca //
T06pskvbhu:1739: punaś ca sandhinirmocane 'py uktam -- ādānavijñāna gambhīrasūkṣmo ogho yathā vartati sarvabījaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1740: bālāna eṣo mayi na prakāśito mā haiva ātmā parikalpayeyuḥ //
T06pskvbhu:1741: yuktim apy adhikṛtyāha -- yato nirodhasamāpattyasañjñisamāpattyāsañjñikebhyo vyutthitasya punar viṣayavijñaptyākhyaṃ pravṛttivijñānam utpadyate
T06pskvbhu:1743: nirodhāsañjñisamāpattisamāpannasyāsañjñike ca prādurbhūte niravaśeṣeṣu pravṛttivijñāneṣu niruddheṣu punarvyutthānakāla ālayavijñānam antareṇa pravṛttivijñānotpattir na yujyate /
T06pskvbhu:1746: asac ca na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ pradhānātmādivat /
T06pskvbhu:1752: evaṃ tarhi kāritraṃ bhāvād anyad ity abhyupagantavyam atītānāgatāvasthayoḥ kāritre 'saty api bhāvābhyupagamāt /
T06pskvbhu:1758: tataś cotpādavyayābhāvān nirodhavan nānityā rūpādayaḥ skandhāḥ syuḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1759: tataś ca duḥkhā api na syuḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1760: uktaṃ hi sūtre -- yad anityaṃ tad duḥkham iti /
T06pskvbhu:1761: evaṃ ca skandhān anityato duḥkhataś ca cintayato viparyāsa eva syāt /
T06pskvbhu:1765: rūpādiṣu ca skandheṣu saṅgrahābhāvāt ṣaṣṭhaḥ skandho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1766: na ca sāsravā dharmā upādānaskandhaiḥ sarve [p. 96] vā saṃskṛtāḥ skandhaiḥ saṅgṛhītā iti vaktavyam //
T06pskvbhu:1767: anyaḥ punar āha -- kāritraṃ nāma phalaparigrahaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1768: dharmo hi yasya dharmasya hetubhāvena vyavatiṣṭhate ,
T06pskvbhu:1769: sa dharmas taṃ dharmaṃ phalatvena gṛhṇātīty ato hetubhāvavyavasthānaṃ bhāvānāṃ phalaparigrahaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1770: hetubhāvena ca sa eva dharmo vyavatiṣṭhata iti dharmebhyaḥ kāritram ananyat /
T06pskvbhu:1773: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- nānyat kāritraṃ dharmāt,
T06pskvbhu:1779: kāritrasya vā dharmasvarūpavad dharmād ananyatvāttraiyadhvakatvam abhyupagantavyam /
T06pskvbhu:1780: evam api kāritreṇādhvāno vyavasthitā iti vādahāniḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1787: ataś ca dharmakāritrayoḥ kṛtākṛtatvāt spaṣṭam anyatvam /
T06pskvbhu:1790: tathā hi phalasya kāraṇavat pūrvam eva pariniṣpannatvāt phalasya kiṃ kurvat kāraṇaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1792: phalam api tenākriyamāṇaṃ kathaṃ tasya kāryaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:1795: tathā hi kāritre sati kāritrāntaraṃ bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:1800: tathā ca yasmin sati yad bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:1802: tat tasya kāraṇam itarac ca kāryam /
T06pskvbhu:1804: evaṃ ca na dharmasvarūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ na kāryam iti lokaśāstravirodhaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1809: anyasvabhāvam api tan naivety anyatvenāpi nocyate /
T06pskvbhu:1810: evaṃ tarhi yan na tatsvabhāvaṃ nānyasvabhāvam ,
T06pskvbhu:1813: evaṃ kāritrāt sarvathāpy adhvavyavasthā na sidhyati /
T06pskvbhu:1820: anyaḥ punar āha -- sendriyaṃ rūpaṃ cittaṃ cānyonyabījakam ity ato nirodhāsañjñisamāpattibhyām asañjñikāc ca vyuttiṣṭhataḥ sendriyād rūpāc cittam utpadyate /
T06pskvbhu:1821: yathārūpyadhātoś cyavamānasya cittād eva ciraniruddham api sendriyaṃ rūpam utpadyata iti /
T06pskvbhu:1822: tasmā[p. 98]n nātra kiñcid ālayavijñānena prayojanam iti /
T06pskvbhu:1823: evaṃ tarhy ekaikasya sattvasya dvau cittasantānau syātām /
T06pskvbhu:1827: tataś cāsya parinirvāṇam eva syād ity akalpaneyam /
T06pskvbhu:1828: ekaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ svasattādhyāsitaṃ nirīham anityaṃ śaktaṃ ceṣyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1830: tathā hy uktaṃ bhagavatā -- asmin satīdaṃ bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:1836: ālayavijñānaṃ hi sarvasaṃskṛtadharmabījānugatam ā maraṇāt santānavṛtti cety ālayavijñānād evācittakāvasthāto vyuttiṣṭhataḥ pravṛttivijñānam utpadyata iti /
T06pskvbhu:1837: sūtre ca -- nirodhasamāpannasya vijñānaṃ kāyād anapakrāntam ity uktam /
T06pskvbhu:1838: na cālayavijñānād anyasya nirodhasamāpattyavasthāyāṃ vijñānasya kāyād anapakramo yujyate /
T06pskvbhu:1841: tataś ca trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśasahajā vedanā sañjñā cetaneti sūtre vacanāt sañjñāvedanayor api samudācāro 'bhyupagantavyaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1842: tataś ca vedanāsañjñāsadbhāvāt sañjñāveditanirodha eva na syāt /
T06pskvbhu:1843: yo 'pi manyate -- sūtre vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā uktā ,
T06pskvbhu:1844: na ca [p. 99] sarvā vedanā tṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1845: evaṃ sparśo 'pi na sarvaḥ sañjñāvedanāpratyaya iti nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1847: viśeṣitā hi vedanā sūtrāntare -- avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇeti /
T06pskvbhu:1848: na tv evaṃ kvacit sparśo viśeṣita ity asamānam etat /
T06pskvbhu:1849: tasmād avaśyam ālayavijñānād eva sarvabījakāt sarvāsv avasthāsu santānena vartamānān nirodhāsañjñisamāpattyāsañjñikebhyo vyutthānacittam utpadyata ity abhyupeyam //
T06pskvbhu:1850: punaś cālambanapratyayāpekṣāṃ prakārāntaravṛttitām upādāya pravṛttivijñānād ālayavijñānam anyad iti pratipattavyam /
T06pskvbhu:1852: ālambanapratyayaḥ pañcānāṃ cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:1858: prakārāntareṇa vṛttir ātmalābho 'sya vijñānasyeti tad vijñānaṃ prakārāntaravṛtti /
T06pskvbhu:1862: tādṛśīṃ prakārāntaravṛttitām upādāya gṛhītvā pravṛttivijñānād anyad ālayavijñānaṃ pravṛttivijñānabījabhūtam astīti vijñāyate /
T06pskvbhu:1863: atra hi vijñānaṃ pratyavabhāsabhedāt parasparato bhidyate . na samanantarādhipatipratyayabhedāt /
T06pskvbhu:1864: ata etad evam uktam -- ālambanapratyayāpekṣāṃ prakārāntaravṛttitām upādāya /
T06pskvbhu:1865: sā ca prakārāntaravṛttitā yathā nālambananirapekṣā yujyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1870: kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ hīnamadhyapraṇītadhātūnāṃ laukikalokottarāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ paryāyeṇa bhāvāt /
T06pskvbhu:1871: na hi tenaiva tasya vāsanā dṛṣṭā nāpy anyena bhinnakālenāsambaddhena vā ,
T06pskvbhu:1872: kiṃ tarhi saho[p. 101]tpādavināśair eva puṣpādibhis tilādīnāṃ vāsanā dṛṣṭā /
T06pskvbhu:1873: ato vipākavāsanāvijñānena samakālaṃ tata evotpadyamānāni nirudhyamānāni ca pravṛttivijñānāni svānurūpakāryotpādanasamarthaṃ vipākavijñānaṃ kurvanti
T06pskvbhu:1875: taiś ca prakārāntaravṛttibhiḥ pravṛttivijñānair vāsitād vipākavijñānāt punar apy ālambanāpekṣāṇi kuśalākuśalādiprakārāntaravṛttīni pravṛttivijñānāny utpadyanta ity avaśyam abhyupagantavyam /
T06pskvbhu:1876: tataś ca vipākavijñānaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtadharmabījānugataṃ pravṛttivijñānebhyo 'nyad iti siddham //
T06pskvbhu:1878: acittakamiddhamūrchādyavasthāsu cchinne pravṛttivijñānasantāne punar acittakamiddhamūrchāpagata ālayavijñānam antareṇa pravṛttivijñānotpattir na yujyate /
T06pskvbhu:1887: ālayavijñānānabhyupagame hi pratisandhivijñānaṃ vā saṃskārapratyayaṃ parikalpyeta ,
T06pskvbhu:1894: evaṃ ca saty aphalam eva karma syāt ,
T06pskvbhu:1895: na hi vartamānāt karmaṇo vipāko nirvartate /
T06pskvbhu:1898: karmāhitāyāś cittasantāne vāsanāyāḥ paripākaviśeṣaṃ gatāyā vipāko nirvartate /
T06pskvbhu:1900: na ca niruddhāt karmaṇo vipāka iti /
T06pskvbhu:1904: na ca nāmarūpam iti kātra yuktiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1909: tasya prātisandhikān nāmarūpāt ka ātmātiśayo yatas tad eva vijñānapratyayaṃ na pūrvam /
T06pskvbhu:1910: pūrvaṃ ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nottaram ity ataś ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam evāstu /
T06pskvbhu:1915: tatpratyayaṃ pratisandhau ca nāmarūpam evety eṣaiva nītir niravadyā /
T06pskvbhu:1916: ṣaḍvijñānakāyāḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitāḥ saṃskārapratyayam vijñānam ity ayam api pakṣo durghaṭita eva /
T06pskvbhu:1918: na hi vijñānaṃ vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāṃ vātmany ādhātuṃ samartham ,
T06pskvbhu:1924: acittakāsu ca middhādyavasthāsu punaḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitacittotpattyasambhavād vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na syāt /
T06pskvbhu:1931: tathā hi kleśādhipatyāt karma punarbhavākṣepasamarthaṃ bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:1933: ata eva na dṛṣṭasatyānāṃ karmāṇi punarbhavam ākṣipanti darśanaprahātavyakleśābhāvāt /
T06pskvbhu:1934: ākṣiptapunarbhavam api karma kleśābhāvān na punarbhavībhavatīti /
T06pskvbhu:1935: tathā hi traidhātukavītarāgāṇām ākṣiptapunarbhavam api karmakleśābhāvād bhavībhavituṃ notsahate /
T06pskvbhu:1937: evaṃ ca pradhānatvāt kleśā eva saṃsārapravṛtter mūlam /
T06pskvbhu:1943: tatra sammukhībhūtaḥ prahīyata ity aniṣṭir eveyam ,
T06pskvbhu:1946: na hi pratipakṣāt tadānīṃ kiñcid anyad abhyupagamyate ,
T06pskvbhu:1949: na hi kleśabījānuṣaktam eva tatpratipakṣo yujyate /
T06pskvbhu:1950: na cāprahīṇakleśabījānāṃ saṃsāravinivṛttiḥ sambhavatīti tasmād avaśyam ālayavijñānaṃ tadanyavijñānasahabhūtaiḥ kleśopakleśair bhāvyate svabījapuṣṭyādhānata ity upeyam /
T06pskvbhu:1951: punaś ca tata eva santatipariṇāmaviśeṣād yathābalaṃ bhāvanāvṛttilābhe sati kleśopakleśāḥ pravartante /
T06pskvbhu:1953: tasmiṃś cāpanīte punas tenāśrayeṇa kleśānām anutpattir iti sopadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥ prāpyate /
T06pskvbhu:1955: na hi karmavidyamānam api kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu sahakārikāraṇābhāvāt punarbhavam abhinirvartayituṃ samartham /
T06pskvbhu:1956: ata evālayavijñāne sati saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttiś ca ,
T06pskvbhu:1958: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tad ālayavijñānam ity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1968: tad vālīyata upanibadhyate kāraṇabhāvena sarvadharmeṣv ity ālayaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1976: anye punar anyathā paṭhanti -- ātmamānālayanimittatāṃ copādāyeti /
T06pskvbhu:1979: ālīyate tasmin viṣayibhāvenātmamāna ity ālayavijñānam ātmamānālayaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:1980: ālīyate vā tan nimittabhāvenātmamāna ity ālaya ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1986: ataḥ kāyapratibaddhavṛttitvāt tat kāye ālīnam iti kāyālīnam /
T06pskvbhu:1988: tāṃ kāyālīnatām upādāya gṛhītvālayavijñānatvam asya pratipattavyam //
T06pskvbhu:1989: na kevalam ālayavijñānam etad ucyate kiṃ tarhy ādānavijñānam apīti /
T06pskvbhu:1990: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tad ādānavijñānam ity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:1994: tac ca yat pūrvasaṃskārahetukaṃ śukraśoṇitasammūrchitāvasthāyāṃ bhavam upādatte /
T06pskvbhu:2006: api ca pratiniyatāśrayapravṛttatvāt ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ vicchedapravṛttatvāc ca na sarvasyāśrayasyopādānaṃ prasajyate /
T06pskvbhu:2007: tathā hi yena yenāśrayeṇa yad vijñānaṃ pravartate ,
T06pskvbhu:2010: tathā cakṣurādivijñānaṃ vicchedena punaḥ punaḥ pravartata iti tadāśrayasya punaḥ punar upādānadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2011: tasmād ālayavijñānam eva pratisandhau kāyam upādatte ā maraṇāc [p. 108] ca samastakāyāśrayeṇa pravartata iti tad eva pratisandhibandhāt prabhṛty ā maraṇāt kāyam upādātta ity ādānavijñānam ity ucyate //
T06pskvbhu:2013: kliṣṭaṃ hi mana ālayavijñānam ātmatvena nityam ālambate ,
T06pskvbhu:2017: yat ṣaṇṇāṃ cakṣurādivijñānakāyānāṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ vijñānaṃ mana ity uktam ,
T06pskvbhu:2021: tac caturbhiḥ kleśair nityaṃ samprayuktam ātmamohātmadṛṣṭyātmamānātmasnehaiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2022: atra tv ātmagrahaṇaṃ na mohamātreṇa samprayujyate ,
T06pskvbhu:2025: ādigrahaṇāt pañcabhiḥ sarvatragaiś ca sparśamanaskārādibhiḥ sadā samprayuktam /
T06pskvbhu:2026: tasyāpratītatvāc caittānām api caittaiḥ samprayogāc ca tatsvarūpanirdhāraṇārtham āha -- vijñānam iti //
T06pskvbhu:2030: santānānuvṛtti cety avicchedena vartata ity arthaḥ //
T06pskvbhu:2039: asañjñisamāpattito nirodhasamāpatteḥ śāntataratvaṃ tadasamucāratvād eva veditavyam /
T06pskvbhu:2040: atra ca mano nirvacanata ālambanataḥ samprayogataḥ pravṛttikālataś ca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam //
T06pskvbhu:2046: yasmāt sūtre -- adhvasantānaprakāragatideśabhedabhinnānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ saṅkṣepasaṅgrahatām upādāya rūpādayaḥ skandhā uktāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2047: yat kiñcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā audarikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ [p. 110] vā praṇītaṃ vā yad vā dūre yad vāntike
T06pskvbhu:2048: sarvam aikadhyam abhisaṅkṣipya rūpaskandha iti saṅkhyāṃ gacchatīty evaṃ yāvad vijñānam /
T06pskvbhu:2059: hīnā vā praṇītā veti gatibhedena bhinnāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2060: tathā hi hīnagatisaṅgṛhītā hīnāḥ praṇītagatisaṅgṛhītāḥ praṇītāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2061: yad vā dūre yad vāntika iti deśabhedena bhinnāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2064: saṅkṣepasaṅgrahatām upādāyety adhvasantānaprakāragatideśabhedabhinnānāṃ rūpavedanāsañjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ pratyekaṃ saṅkṣepeṇa saṅgrahaḥ saṅkṣepasaṅgrahaḥ
T06pskvbhu:2066: tāṃ saṅkṣepasaṅgrahatām upādāya sūtre rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtho vijñāyate /
T06pskvbhu:2068: tat sarvam atītādikaṃ rūpam [p. 111] ekadhyam abhisaṅkṣipya rūpaskandha iti saṅkhyāṃ gacchatīti /
T06pskvbhu:2074: kaś cāyatanārtha ity ata āha -- dvādaśāyatanānīti /
T06pskvbhu:2076: cakṣurāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ yāvad manaāyatanaṃ dharmāyatanaṃ ca iti /
T06pskvbhu:2080: tatra hy uktaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya varṇaviṣayo rūpaprasādaś cakṣurindriyam iti /
T06pskvbhu:2081: evaṃ śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyaviṣayā yathākramaṃ rūpātmakāḥ prasādāḥ śrotrādayaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2082: rūpaśabdagandharasāyatanānāṃ ca pūrvavan nirdeśa iti sambadhyate /
T06pskvbhu:2083: pūrvaṃ hi nirdiṣṭaś cakṣuṣo viṣayo varṇaḥ saṃsthānaṃ vijñaptiś ca rūpam /
T06pskvbhu:2092: āyatanavyavasthāyāṃ tu vijñānaskandha eva manaāyatanam ucyate //
T06pskvbhu:2093: punar aṣṭaprakāraṃ -- vedanāsañjñāsaṃskāraskandhā avijñaptiś cāsaṃskṛtāni ca catvāri /
T06pskvbhu:2094: tatra vedanāsañjñāsaṃskāraskandhā avijñaptiś ca skandhavibhaṅga evoktāḥ //
T06pskvbhu:2095: asaṃskṛtaṃ tu noktam ity atas tatprabhedabubhutsayā pṛcchati -- asaṃskṛtaṃ katamad iti /
T06pskvbhu:2098: ākāśam apratisaṅkhyānirodhaḥ pratisaṅkhyānirodhas tathatā cety asaṃskṛtaprabhedapradarśanam /
T06pskvbhu:2102: sapratighaṃ rūpaṃ yatra pradeśe na pratihanyate ,
T06pskvbhu:2104: ato rūpiṇāṃ bhāvānām avakāśadānād ākāśam ity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:2105: ākā[p. 113]śānantaram uddiṣṭatvāt tannirdeśānantaram evāpratisaṅkhyānirodhasvarūpāvabodhārthaṃ praśnaḥ -- apratisaṅkhyānirodhaḥ katama iti /
T06pskvbhu:2108: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- duḥkhādīnām āryasatyānāṃ pratipratisaṅkhyānaṃ pratisaṅkhyā /
T06pskvbhu:2113: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- pratyayavaikalyād anāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo 'tyantam anutpādaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2115: yo nirodho na ca visaṃyoga ityādi praśnavyākaraṇam /
T06pskvbhu:2116: nirodhaśabdo hy atra pratisaṅkhyānirodhasamāpattyupapattyanityatānirodheṣv api vartata iti pratisaṅkhyānirodhavyavacchedārtham āha -- na ca visaṃyoga iti /
T06pskvbhu:2117: saṃyogo hy anāgatair dharmair bīje sati teṣām utpattidharmatām upādāya vyavasthāpyate /
T06pskvbhu:2118: tatpratipakṣeṇa svāśrayāt teṣāṃ bīje 'poddhṛte yo 'tyantam anutpādaḥ [*...(?)] pratilabdha iti so 'py apratisaṅkhyānirodhaḥ [p. 114] prāpnotīty ata āha -- sa punar yaḥ kleśapratipakṣeṇa vinā skandhānām atyantam anutpāda iti /
T06pskvbhu:2119: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- ayaṃ hi saty api kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaskandhabījasadbhāvena vinā kleśapratipakṣeṇa labhyata iti pratisaṅkhyānirodha evāyam
T06pskvbhu:2121: evaṃ sopadhiśeṣo nirupadhiśeṣaś ca nirvāṇadhātuḥ pratisaṅkhyānirodha ity uktaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:2133: tadālambanaiḥ pañcabhir vijñānakāyair na śakyam utpattum ,
T06pskvbhu:2142: sarvanirodhaprasaṅga ity āha -- sa ca visaṃyoga iti /
T06pskvbhu:2143: evaṃ hi śeṣebhyaś caturbhyo nirodhebhyo vyavacchinno bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:2145: visaṃyogam eva nirūpayati -- sa punar yaḥ kleśapratipakṣeṇa skandhānām atyantam anutpāda iti /
T06pskvbhu:2147: tatra yasya yasya yo yo mārgakṣaṇaḥ pratipakṣaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2148: tasmin mārga utpanne sa āśrayakṣaṇas tatpraheyakleśabījānugatam anantarasyāśrayasya kṣaṇāntaram utpādayituṃ na śaknoti ,
T06pskvbhu:2152: sa eva mārgakṣaṇas tatpraheyakleṣabījānugatasya kṣaṇāntarasyotpattaye viguṇaḥ pratyayaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2154: evaṃ yāvad bhāvanāheyasya mṛdumṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣa utpanne sa āśrayo niravaśeṣatraidhātukadarśanabhāvanāprahātavyakleśabījavyāvṛttyātmakasyaiva kṣaṇāntarasya kāraṇībhavati /
T06pskvbhu:2155: evaṃ yasya yasya kleśasyāśrayāpravṛttito bījam uddhṛtaṃ bhavati ,
T06pskvbhu:2156: tasya tasya tatsamprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kleśapratipakṣeṇātyantam anutpādaḥ prāpto bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:2158: pratisaṅkhyānirodhād anantaraṃ tathatoddiṣṭety atas tannirdeśānantaraṃ tathatāvabodhārthaṃ praśnaḥ -- tathatā katameti /
T06pskvbhu:2159: yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmanairātmyam iti tannirdeśaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2164: dharmāṇāṃ kāryānityatādayo 'pi dharmatā vidyanta ity ata āha -- dharmanairātmyam iti /
T06pskvbhu:2165: dharmā hi yena rūpeṇa jñānābhidhānayor viṣayībhavanti ,
T06pskvbhu:2167: tasmād ātmano nirgatā atatsvabhāvatvād iti nirātmānaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2170: atra tu vicāryamāṇe bahu vakta[p. 117]vyaṃ jāyata ity alaṃ prasaṅgena ,
T06pskvbhu:2173: āyatanaśabdo hi cakṣurādiṣu parasparavibhinnarūpeṣv aviśeṣeṇa pravartata ity atas teṣu tena sāmānyam artham upādāya pravartitavyam ,
T06pskvbhu:2174: sa ca na vijñāyata iti praśnaḥ -- kenārthenāyatananīti /
T06pskvbhu:2178: vijñānāyasya dvāraṃ hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ nimittaṃ vijñānāyadvāram /
T06pskvbhu:2181: nirvacanāt -- cittacaittānām āyaṃ tanvanti vistṛṇvantīty āyatanāni /
T06pskvbhu:2183: tatra cakṣū rūpāṇi ca sasamprayogasya cakṣurvijñānasyāyadvāram /
T06pskvbhu:2184: evaṃ yāvan mano dharmāś ca sasamprayogasya manovijñānasyāyadvāram //
T06pskvbhu:2185: āyatanānantaraṃ dhātavaḥ prabhedataḥ svarūpataś ca vaktavyā ity ataḥ prabhedadarśanārtham āha -- aṣṭādaśa dhātava iti /
T06pskvbhu:2186: teṣām eva svarūpapradarśanārtham āha -- cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātur evaṃ yāvan manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātur iti
T06pskvbhu:2187: atra hi rūpaskandhavibhāge yāni cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanāni pañcendriyāṇy uktāni pañca ca rūpaśabdagandharasasparśāḥ teṣāṃ viṣayatvena
T06pskvbhu:2188: āyatana[p. 118]vyavasthāyāṃ tāny eva pañcendriyāṇi cakṣurādyāyatanatvenoktāni rūpādayaś ca viṣayārūpādyāyatanatvena /
T06pskvbhu:2189: dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ ta eva cakṣurdhātur yāvat kāyadhātuḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2190: rūpadhātur yāvat spraṣṭavyadhātur ity uktam ity ata āha -- tatra cakṣurādidhātavo rūpādidhātavaś ca yathāyatanānīti /
T06pskvbhu:2191: dharmadhātus tu yad eva dharmāyatanaṃ vedanādayas trayaḥ skandhā avijñaptir asaṃskṛtacatuṣṭayaṃ ca /
T06pskvbhu:2193: na punar evaṃ dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ manaāyatanam eva manodhātuḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2194: kiṃ tarhi manaāyatanaṃ dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ sapta cittadhātavaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2200: evaṃ śrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanamanaāśrayāṇi śabdagandharasasparśadharmālambanāni yathākramaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānāni śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātavaḥ
T06pskvbhu:2202: kiṃ tarhi ta eva ṣaḍvijñānadhātavo 'nantaraniruddhā manodhātur ity ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:2203: nanv evaṃ saptadaśa dhātavaḥ prāpnuvanti dvādaśa vā ,
T06pskvbhu:2208: yo rūpaskandha ity ekādaśadravyako hi rūpaskandha uktaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2209: tatra pañcendriyāṇi cakṣurādīni pañca viṣayā rūpādaya āyatanavyavasthāyāṃ daśāyatanāni ,
T06pskvbhu:2212: yo vijñānaskandhaḥ sa manaāyatanaṃ cittadhātavaś ca sapta ,
T06pskvbhu:2214: ye 'nye rūpaskandhād vijñānaskandhāc ca trayo vedanāsañjñāsaṃskārākhyāḥ skandhā rūpaskandhapradeśaś cāvijñaptyākhyaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2216: kenārthena dhātava ity āyatanārthavat vistareṇa vācyam /
T06pskvbhu:2219: na hi kṣaṇikānāṃ vyāpāraḥ sambhavatīti pūrvam evoktam //
T06pskvbhu:2220: ya eva dharmāḥ skandhā iti deśitāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2221: ta eva punar āyatanatvena dhātutvena cety ataḥ pṛcchati -- kimarthaṃ skandhādideśaneti /
T06pskvbhu:2222: sarvā hi deśanā bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ saprayojanā sattvārthapravṛttatvāt kleśapratipakṣeṇa ca /
T06pskvbhu:2223: na cātra prayojanaṃ vijñāyate -- punaḥ punas teṣām eva dharmāṇām anyenānyena ca prakāreṇa deśanā iti kimarthaṃ skandhādideśaneti prayojanaṃ vaktavyam ity ata āha -- trividhātmagrāhapratipakṣeṇeti /
T06pskvbhu:2224: [p. 120] tatra navijñāyate katamas trividha ātmagrāhaḥ katamasya vā pratipakṣeṇa katamā deśanety ata āha -- yathākramaṃ trividha ātmagrāha ekatvagrāho bhoktṛtvagrāhaḥ kartṛtvagrāhaś ca /
T06pskvbhu:2228: sarve hy ātmavādina evaṃ pratipannāḥ -- ya eva paśyati ,
T06pskvbhu:2229: sa eva śṛṇoti jighraty āsvādayatispṛśati ceti /
T06pskvbhu:2232: na hi sattvātmabhāva evaṃ skandhavyatirikto 'nyaḥ kaścid ekavyavasthitarūpo vidyate ,
T06pskvbhu:2235: cakṣur eva hi darśanākhyasya vijñānasyāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇam āśrayaś ceti draṣṭṛtvenopacaryate /
T06pskvbhu:2242: ekatvagrāhe vyāvartite skandhadeśanayā yas tatraikatvagrāhapūrvaka ātmagrāhaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2243: asāv api vyāvartita evety ata ekatvagrāhapūrvātmagrāhapratipakṣeṇa skandhadeśanā /
T06pskvbhu:2244: e[p. 121]katvagrāhas tu kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvātmagrāha ity uktaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2245: bhoktṛgrāhaḥ punaḥ sarvavādināṃ yaḥ śubhāśubhasya karmaṇa iṣṭāniṣṭaṃ sukhaduḥkhavedanāprabhāvitaṃ phalam upabhuṅkte rūpaśabdādīṃś ca viṣayān
T06pskvbhu:2248: śubhāśubhakarmaphalasya rūpādīnāṃ ca viṣayāṇām upabhuktir upalabdhiḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2251: tāṃ ṣaṭprakārām upalabdhim āyatanāny eva kurvanti ,
T06pskvbhu:2253: ata eva cakṣurādayo rūpādayaś ca vijñānāyadvārārthenāyatanānīty ucyante /
T06pskvbhu:2254: tasmān nāsti kaścid anyaś cakṣurādivyatirekeṇa karmaphalasya viṣayāṇāṃ copabhoktety evam āyatanadeśanā bhoktṛtvagrāhapratipakṣeṇeti /
T06pskvbhu:2255: kartṛtvagrāhaḥ punar yaḥ śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā valganāsphoṭanādīnāṃ ca ,
T06pskvbhu:2259: evaṃ kāraṇaṃ sattāmātreṇa kāryotpattiṃ prati vyāpriyate ,
T06pskvbhu:2265: [p. 122] idānīṃ dharmapravicayānugrahārthaṃ ya eva skandhāyatanadhātutvena dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2267: tatra dhātuṣu rūpacittayor vibhaktatvena vistarāpadeśāt sāsravaprakārādīnāṃ sukhagamyo nirdeśa iti dhātūn evārabhya cintyate ,
T06pskvbhu:2268: na skandhāyatanānity ata evāha -- aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati rūpiṇa ityādi /
T06pskvbhu:2269: rūpaṇaṃ rūpaṃ tad eṣām astīti rūpiṇaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2270: āśrayāśritaṃ rūpaṃ vā yathāsambhavam eṣām astīti rūpiṇaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2277: avijñaptirūpe saty api na dharmadhāto rūpitvaprasaṅgas tasyāśrayāśritarūpābhāvād rūpaṇābhāvādrūpaskandhāsaṅgrahāc ca //
T06pskvbhu:2281: te punar aṣṭau -- sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuś ca /
T06pskvbhu:2285: idam ihāmutreti ayam eva vyapa[p. 123]deśo nidarśanam /
T06pskvbhu:2288: idam eva nidarśanārthaṃ prabhāvayann āha -- deśanidarśaneneti /
T06pskvbhu:2290: ekasyaiva rūpadhātoḥ sanidarśanatvena parigrahāt śeṣāḥ saptadaśa ,
T06pskvbhu:2291: cakṣurādidhātavaḥ pañca śabdādidhātavaś catvāro dharmadhātur ekaḥ sapta cittadhātavaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2295: dharmadhātāv apy avijñaptirūpasadbhāvād asti rūpivyapadeśa iti daśety āha /
T06pskvbhu:2297: te punaś cakṣurādīndriyadhātavaḥ pañca tadviṣayā rūpādidhātavaś ca pañca /
T06pskvbhu:2301: iha tv āvaraṇapratighātenaiva sapratighatvam iṣṭam iti pratipādayann āha -- yatra yaś ca pratihanyata iti /
T06pskvbhu:2303: evaṃ ca yenānyasya svadeśa utpattiḥ pratibadhyate yasya ca pratibadhyate ,
T06pskvbhu:2304: tadubha[p. 124]yam api sapratigham iti jñāpitaṃ bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:2305: etena ca daśa rūpiṇo dhātavaḥ parasparasya svadeśa utpattiṃ pratibadhnantīty āvaraṇapratighātena sapratighāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2306: śeṣāḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuś cāpratighā iti siddham //
T06pskvbhu:2309: pañcadaśa trayāṇāṃ ca paścimānāṃ bhāga iti /
T06pskvbhu:2310: cakṣurādayaḥ pañcendriyadhātavo rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayadhātavaḥ pañca cakṣurādivijñānadhātavaś ca - ete pañcadaśa ekāntena sāsravā eva /
T06pskvbhu:2311: ādyā api trayo vidyante cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānadhātava ity ata āha -- paścimānām iti /
T06pskvbhu:2312: paścimās trayo manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātuś ca /
T06pskvbhu:2314: na tu cakṣurādivat sarva eva sāsravāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2315: teṣāṃ punar yo na mārgasatyāsaṃskṛtasvabhāvo bhāgaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2322: nocyate cakṣurādivijñānair eva saha rūpādiṣu kleśā utpadyanta iti ,
T06pskvbhu:2323: kiṃ tarhi pratyakṣagocaratām upādāya [p. 125] rūpādiṣu kleśotpattir ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:2324: tathā hi cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpāṇi ca pratītya cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate ,
T06pskvbhu:2334: pañca rūpādayo viṣayāḥ kāmyanta iti kāmāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2337: athavā kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktā iti vaktavye dhātuśabdalopāt kāmapratisaṃyuktā ity uktāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2341: te punaḥ sarve -- ṣaḍ indriyadhātavaḥ ṣaḍ viṣayadhātavaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātavaś ca //
T06pskvbhu:2347: kim punaḥ kāraṇaṃ gandharasayo rūpadhātau na bhāvas tadvijñānayoś ca /
T06pskvbhu:2350: api ca kavaḍīkārāhāravītarāgāś ca rūpadhātāv upapadyante ,
T06pskvbhu:2359: atas tatra daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavas tadāśrayālambanāś ca pañca vijñānadhātavo na santi //
T06pskvbhu:2379: evam anyo 'pi yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ praśaṃsām arhati ,
T06pskvbhu:2383: daśa trividhā iti -- kuśalā apy akuśalā apy avyākṛtā api /
T06pskvbhu:2384: te tu na vijñāyanta aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ katame daśety āha -- saptacittadhātavor rūpaśabdadharmadhātavaś ceti /
T06pskvbhu:2393: dharmadhātur alobhādisvabhāvasamprayuktasamutthaḥ pratisaṅkhyānirodhas tathatā ca kuśalaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2397: ete hy avyākṛtā eva paramārthasvabhāvasamprayogasamutthānataḥ kuśalākuśalatvābhāvāt //
T06pskvbhu:2401: te tu na prajñāyante katamedvādaśety āha -- rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmadhātūn sthāpayitveti /
T06pskvbhu:2402: śeṣāḥ ṣaḍ indriyadhātavaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ity ete dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ //
T06pskvbhu:2405: te tu na vijñāyanta ity ata āha -- ye sthāpitāḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2411: ātmany asati katham ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā bhavati /
T06pskvbhu:2412: na hi śīle 'saty adhiśīlaṃ śikṣā yujyate /
T06pskvbhu:2418: cittam eva caittānām āśraya iti cittam evātmatvenopacaryate /
T06pskvbhu:2419: kathaṃ [p. 129] punar etad gamyate 'trātmatvena cittam abhipretam iti /
T06pskvbhu:2420: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā -- ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita iti /
T06pskvbhu:2421: cittasya cānyatra damanam uktam -- cittasya damanaṃ sādhu ,
T06pskvbhu:2423: atra hi cittasya damanaṃ cittam eva dāntaṃ sukhāvaham ity uktam /
T06pskvbhu:2424: ato 'trāpy ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita iti cittam evābhipretam iti vijñāyate /
T06pskvbhu:2425: ataś cātmabhūtasya cittasyāśrayabhāvena pratyāsannatvāc cakṣurādīnām ādhyātmikatvam /
T06pskvbhu:2427: evaṃ tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti ,
T06pskvbhu:2428: na hy ete manodhātutvam aprāptāś cittasyāśrayībhavantīti /
T06pskvbhu:2429: yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātivartanta iti //
T06pskvbhu:2432: te 'pi na jñāyante katame saptety ata āha -- cittadhātava iti /
T06pskvbhu:2436: caśabdaḥ samuccaye -- sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaś ca sālambana iti /
T06pskvbhu:2443: te punar daśa -- pañcendriyadhātavaś cakṣurādayaḥ pañca viṣayadhātavo rūpādayo /
T06pskvbhu:2448: manodhātur manovijñānadhātur dharmadhātoś ca pradeśo yaḥ samprayuktaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2456: traiyadhvikaparo kṣārthābhyūhanākāra idam evaṃ naivam iti prajñāviśeṣaś cetanā vā 'bhirūpaṇāvikalpaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2462: te punaḥ pañcadaśa dhātavo dharmadhātoś ca pradeśaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2472: na cāsata upāttatvam anupāttatvaṃ vā yujyate /
T06pskvbhu:2473: vartamānās tu svasattādhyāsitatvāt cittacaittaiś copāttatvād upāttā eva cakṣurādayaḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2478: katam eṣāṃ caturṇām ity atra āha -- rūparasagandhaspraṣṭavyānām iti /
T06pskvbhu:2482: tadyathā mūlavarjyeṣu keśaromanakhadanteṣu viṇmūtrakheṭasiṅghāṇakaśoṇitādiṣu bhūmyudakādiṣu ca /
T06pskvbhu:2492: sa punar ya indriyāvinirbhāgavartinaṃ bhāgaṃ sthāpayitvā mūlavarjyeṣu keśaromādiṣu vartate //
T06pskvbhu:2497: teṣāṃ na vijñāyate katame pañcety ata āha -- rūpiṇa iti te punaś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanadhātavaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2498: kasya sabhāgāḥ kena prakāreṇa sabhāgā iti na vijñāyate ,
T06pskvbhu:2501: tena svavijñānena cakṣuḥ svaviṣayeṇa rūpeṇa samānam /
T06pskvbhu:2503: sāmānyatām upādāyeti gṛhītvā cakṣuḥ svaviṣayeṇa rūpeṇa sabhāgam ucyate /
T06pskvbhu:2504: evaṃ śrotrādīnām api svaviṣayaiḥ sabhāgatā vaktavyā /
T06pskvbhu:2505: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- ye cakṣurādayaḥ svavijñānair adhyāsitāḥ ,
T06pskvbhu:2508: kimarthaṃ punas te tatsabhāgā ity ucyante /
T06pskvbhu:2510: svavijñānaśūnyāś cakṣurādayas te sabhāgānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ cakṣurādijātyā samānā iti taiḥ sadṛśatvāt tatsabhāgā ity ucyante /
T06pskvbhu:2511: ete hy asādhāraṇatvād ya ekasya sabhāgās tatsabhāgā vā ,
T06pskvbhu:2512: te sarvasattvānām apīti niyatam eṣāṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgatvam /
T06pskvbhu:2513: rūpādīnāṃ tu pratisantāne sabhāgatatsabhāgatvam ity anavasthitam /
T06pskvbhu:2514: na ca vijñānād anyat kāritram astīti nānyeṣāṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgatvam uktam //
T06pskvbhu:2517: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
T06pskvbhu:2518: teṣām ca yo nirodha evaṃvādi mahāśramaṇaḥ /
T06pskvbhu:2520: yad atra puṇyaṃ tad bhavatv ācāryopādhyāyamātāpitṛpūrvaṅgamaṃ kṛtvā sakalasattvarāśer anuttarajñānaphalāvāptaya iti /
